no_words_to_repair: Níl aon téacs sa bhosca abairtí le mionathrú. Ligeann an uirlis deisiúcháin duit focail a shuimiú, a scriosadh, a bhogadh nó a mhodhnú go tapa chun athruithe a dhéanamh laistigh d'fhuinneog cainte reatha an úsáideora. [[ There is no text in the sentence box to modify. The repairs tool lets you quickly add, delete, move or modify words to make changes within the user's current speech window.

every_voice_should_be_heard: Ba cheart gach guth a chloisteáil [[ Every voice should be heard
private_data_reminder: Cuimhnigh: féadfaidh sonraí úsáideoirí a bheith i ngach bord agus tuarascáil, agus ba chóir iad a choinneáil príobháideach agus caitheamh leo le meas. [[ Remember: all boards and reports may contain user data, and should be kept private and treated with respect.

stay_on_board: Fan ar an mBord seo [[ Stay on this Board
did_you_know: An raibh a fhios agat? Tá %app_name% ar fáil anois mar [[ Did you know? %app_name% is now available as a
lifetime_purpose: cheannach feadh an tsaoil [[ lifetime purchase
communication_is_for_everyone: Tá cumarsáid do gach duine. %app_name% [[ Communication is for everyone. %app_name%
empowers_hearing: cuireann sé ar chumas daoine a nglór a chur in iúl. [[ empowers people to make their voices heard.
coughdrop_lets_you: Is deacair daoine áirithe a chloisteáil -- gan aon locht orthu féin. Bíonn sé níos deacra do go leor daoine cumarsáid a dhéanamh ina n-aonar mar gheall ar mhíchumas mar uathachas, pairilis cheirbreach, siondróm Down, siondróm Angelman agus siondróm Rett. Is féidir le bogearraí cumhachtacha ar a dtugtar Cumarsáid Mhéadaithe agus Mhalartach (AAC) na bearnaí a líonadh agus gach guth a chloisteáil. [[ Some people are hard to hear -- through no fault of their own. Disabilities like autism, cerebral palsy, Down syndrome, Angelman syndrome and Rett syndrome make it harder for many individuals to communicate on their own. Powerful software called Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) can fill the gaps and make every voice heard.
coughdrop_lets_you_2: Ag %app_name% oibrímid chun guthanna na ndaoine sin a bhfuil riachtanais chasta cumarsáide acu a thabhairt amach trí theicneolaíocht chumhachtach foinse oscailte a oiriúnú go héasca don duine aonair agus a thacaíonn le gach duine timpeall orthu agus iad ag iarraidh cabhrú leo rathúlacht a dhéanamh. [[ At %app_name% we work to help bring out the voices of those with complex communication needs through powerful open-source technology that easily adapts to the individual and supports everyone around them trying to help them succeed.
more_download_options: Tuilleadh roghanna íoslódáil [[ more download options
personalize_text: cumarsáid agus rochtain thar ilfheistí. Fás do stór focal le himeacht ama le comhéadan simplí agus go leor cabhrach agus oiliúna mar thaca leis. [[ communication and access across multiple devices. Grow your vocabulary over time with a simple interface backed up by lots of help and training.
offline_text: le cúltaca sa scamall mar sin ní bheidh aon phian ann gléasanna a athrú má bhriseann rud éigin. Is féidir leat freisin cláir a roinnt le daoine eile agus iad a cheadúnú oscailte d’aon duine le húsáid. [[ with backup in the cloud so it's painless to switch devices if something breaks. You can also share boards with others and open-license them for anyone to use.
empower_the_team: Cumhacht a thabhairt don fhoireann [[ Empower the team
insights_text: le tuarascálacha a chuidíonn le gach duine feabhsú. Is féidir le foirne oibriú i gcomhar le chéile agus cláir a mhodhnú do gach duine aonair gan a gcuid gléas a thógáil uaidh. [[ with reports that help everyone improve. Teams can collaborate and modify boards for each individual without having to take their device away.
pricing_per_communicator: Tá praghas in aghaidh an chumarsáideora ar %app_name%, mar sin is féidir le tuismitheoirí, teiripeoirí agus múinteoirí clárú saor in aisce agus na gnéithe tuairiscithe agus cumarsáide cumhachtacha a úsáid ar a ngléasanna féin gan an banc a bhriseadh. [[ %app_name% is priced per-communicator, so parents, therapists, and teachers can all sign up for free and use the powerful reporting and communication features on their own devices without breaking the bank.
whats_it_cost: féach ar ár sonraí praghsála. [[ see our pricing details.
see_how: féach conas atá daoine ag úsáid [[ see how people are using
try_coughdrop: Bain triail as %app_name_upper% duit féin [[ Try %app_name_upper% for yourself
sign_up_for_free: Réidh chun níos mó a fheiceáil? Cláraigh anois le tosú! [[ Ready to see more? Sign up now to get started!
allow_cookies: Seol sonraí úsáide chuig %app_name% le haghaidh anailísíochta, rianú earráide agus feabhsuithe gné [[ Send usage data to %app_name% for analytics, error tracking and feature improvements
see_exmaples: ...nó seiceáil roinnt boird a roinntear go poiblí [[ ...or check out some publicly-shared boards
people_i_supervise: Daoine a Maoirsím [[ People I Supervise
no_goal_set: gan aon sprioc a leagan síos [[ no goal set
set_a_goal: sprioc a shocrú [[ set a goal
ready_to_try_coughdrop: Réidh chun triail a bhaint as %app_name% duit féin? Faigheann gach clárú 2 mhí saor chun na boinn a chiceáil agus féachaint an bhfuil an aip chun oibriú dóibh, níl aon chárta creidmheasa ag teastáil! [[ Ready to try %app_name% out for yourself? Every signup gets 2 months free to kick the tires and see if the app is going to work for them, no credit card required!

javscript_info: Ní lódálfadh an leathanach seo fiú gan inneall JavaScript réasúnta nua-aimseartha. [[ This page wouldn't even load without a relatively-modern JavaScript engine.
local_storage_info: Úsáidtear localStorage in ionad fianáin chun cuimhneamh an bhfuil úsáideoir logáilte isteach cheana féin, cén bord ar a raibh siad, etc. [[ localStorage is used instead of cookies to remember whether a user is already logged in, what board they were on, etc.
speech_synthesis_info: Cuireann an chuid is mó de na brabhsálaithe gréasáin nua-aimseartha inneall Sintéise Urlabhra i bhfeidhm ar féidir é a úsáid chun téacs a thiontú ina chaint. [[ Most modern web browsers implement a Speech Synthesis engine that can be used to turn text into speech.
speech_synthesis_voices: Guthanna Sintéise Urlabhra [[ Speech Synthesis Voices
speech_synthesis_info2: Má thacaíonn do ghléas le Sintéis Urlabhra, ba cheart go mbeadh guthanna amháin nó níos mó suiteáilte aige de réir réamhshocraithe. Uaireanta is féidir guthanna "caillte" a fháil agus stop a chur le feiceáil ar an bhfeiste. [[ If your device supports Speech Synthesis, it should have one or more voices installed by default. Sometimes voices can get "lost" and stop appearing on the device.
file_uploads_info: Ní thacaíonn gach brabhsálaí leis na gnéithe uaslódála comhad nua-aimseartha a úsáideann %app_name%. Mura ndéanann do ghléas, ba cheart don chuid is mó de na brabhsálaithe deisce nua-aimseartha a uaslódáil go breá. [[ Not all browsers support the modern file uploading features that %app_name% uses. If your device doesn't, most modern desktop browsers should upload just fine.
file_storage_info: Ligeann gléasanna agus roinnt brabhsálaithe duit comhaid a stóráil le húsáid as líne. Mura bhfuil an ghné seo ar fáil, is féidir roinnt comhad a stóráil sa bhunachar sonraí ach seans go mbeidh earráidí stórála agat. [[ Devices and some browsers allow you to store files for offline use. If this feature is not available, some files can be stored in the database but you may run into storage errors.
indexed_db_info: Is uirlis stórála é IndexedDB a úsáidtear chun cláir agus inneachar cláir a íoslódáil ionas gur féidir le %app_name% oibriú go fóill fiú gan nasc Idirlín. Má éiríonn cuimhne an ghléis lán uaireanta scriosfar na bunachair shonraí seo go huathoibríoch (agus gan choinne). [[ IndexedDB is a storage tool used to download boards and board contents so that %app_name% can still work even without an Internet connection. If the device's memory gets full sometimes these databases will be automatically (and unexpectedly) deleted.
sqlite_info: Is uirlis stórála eile é SQLite a úsáidtear chun cláir agus inneachar cláir a íoslódáil ionas gur féidir le %app_name% oibriú go fóill fiú gan nasc Idirlín. Níl bunachair shonraí SQLite ar fáil ar an oiread gléasanna, ach ní scriosfar iad gan chead. [[ SQLite is another storage tool used to download boards and board contents so that %app_name% can still work even without an Internet connection. SQLite databases aren't available on as many devices, but won't get deleted without permission.
media_recording_info: Ligeann Taifeadadh Meáin duit pictiúir a ghlacadh agus fuaim a thaifeadadh trí úsáid a bhaint as ceamara gréasáin do ghléis. Úsáideann roinnt gléasanna soghluaiste a n-uirlisí taifeadta meán ionsuite féin in ionad taifeadáin %app_name%. [[ Media Recording allows you to take pictures and record audio using your device's webcam. Some mobile devices use their own built-in media recording tools instead of %app_name%'s recorders.
xhr_cors_info: Chun oibriú as líne, ní mór do %app_name% íomhánna a íoslódáil ó láithreáin ghréasáin iolracha. Níl XHR/CORS ag teastáil le go n-oibreoidh sé seo, ach déanann sé an próiseas íoslódála níos éifeachtaí. [[ In order to work offline, %app_name% needs to download images from multiple web sites. XHR/CORS is not required for this to work, but it makes the download process more efficient.
canvas_info: Ligeann %app_name% duit íomhánna a bhearradh agus a dhathú chun do riachtanais cláir a mheaitseáil níos fearr, agus úsáideann sé rud ar a dtugtar an eilimint Canbhás chun é sin a dhéanamh. [[ %app_name% lets you crop and colorize images to better match your board requirements, and it uses something called the Canvas element to make that happen.
audio_playback_info: Má thaifeadann tú d’fhuaimeanna féin beidh tú ag iarraidh go mbeifeá in ann iad a sheinm ar ais, ach ní thacaíonn gach brabhsálaí le hathsheinm fuaime, nó ní thacaíonn siad i gcónaí leis na cineálacha comhaid a úsáideann %app_name%. [[ If you record your own sounds you'll want to be able to play them back, but not all browsers support audio playback, or don't always support the file types %app_name% uses.
drag_and_drop: Tarraing agus Buail [[ Drag and Drop
drag_and_drop_info: Ní dhéanann sé ciall ar ghléas soghluaiste, ach ar bhrabhsálaí deisce má tharraingítear agus má scaoiltear íomhánna agus fuaimeanna ar chnaipí agus an eagarthóireacht is féidir go leor ama a shábháil. [[ It doesn't make sense on a mobile device, but on a desktop browser dragging and dropping images and sounds onto buttons while editing can save a lot of time.
file_reader_info: Is comhpháirt riachtanach í an uirlis FileReader má tá tú ag uaslódáil íomhánna nó fuaime ó do ríomhaire le húsáid in CoughDrop. [[ The FileReader tool is a required component if you're uploading images or audio from your computer to use in CoughDrop.
geolocation_info: Úsáideann %app_name% go roghnach geoshuíomh chun úsáid a rianú agus chun tuairiscí a thógáil ar féidir cumarsáid a chur i gcomparáid thar áiteanna iolracha. [[ %app_name% optionally uses geolocation to track usage and build reports that can compare communication across multiple locations.
speech_to_text: Óráid go Téacs [[ Speech to Text
speech_to_text_info: Ligeann roinnt brabhsálaithe duit labhairt agus do chuid focal a thiontú go téacs. Féadann sé seo é a dhéanamh níos fusa rudaí a dhéanamh mar liosta cnaipí a dhéanamh le cur le clár nuachruthaithe. [[ Some browsers allow you speak and have your words converted to text. This can make it easier to do things like make a list of buttons to add to a newly-created board.
online: Stádas Ar Líne/As Líne [[ Online/Offline Status
online_info: Ligeann roinnt brabhsálaithe seiceáil do stádas ar líne/as líne. Is féidir le %app_name% é seo a úsáid chun feidhmiú níos éifeachtaí as líne, agus chun athruithe agus logaí a shioncronú go huathoibríoch nuair a athbhunaítear nasc Idirlín. [[ Some browsers allow checking for online/offline status. %app_name% can use this to function more effectively offline, and to automatically sync changes and logs when an Internet connection is re-established.
wakelock_info: Ligeann roinnt gléasanna soghluaiste do %app_name% an scáileán a chosc ó mhúchadh de bharr neamhghníomhaíochta. Ní choinníonn %app_name% an scáileán ar siúl ach amháin nuair atá sé sa Mhód Speak nó nuair a bhíonn cláir á sioncronú go gníomhach. [[ Some mobile devices allow %app_name% to prevent the screen from turning off due to inactivity. %app_name% only keeps the screen on when in Speak Mode or when actively syncing boards.
fullscreen: Mód Scáileáin Iomlán [[ Full Screen Mode
fullscreen_info: Ar ghléasanna áirithe is féidir le %app_name% mód lánscáileáin a ghníomhachtú agus é sa Mhód Speak chun aon chnaipe nascleanúna agus stádais a cheilt ón radharc. [[ On some devices %app_name% can activate full screen mode when in Speak Mode to hide any navigation and status buttons from view.

restrict_log_access: Srian le rochtain ar mo logaí úsáide amh. TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Beidh tuarascálacha cuntais úsáideora fós ar fáil do mhaoirseoirí a bhfuil cead rochtana acu. [[ Restrict access to my raw usage logs. NOTE: User account reports will still be available to supervisors with access permissions.
confirm_logging_code: Sular féidir leat socruithe rochtana logála a athrú, ní mór duit cead a dhearbhú ag baint úsáide as an gcód logála reatha. Má tá an cód seo caillte nó dearmadta agat, déan teagmháil leis an bhfoireann tacaíochta theicniúil. [[ Before you can change log access settings, you must confirm permission using the current logging code. If you have lost or forgotten this code, please contact technical support.
allow_log_reports: Ceadaigh sonraí logála gan ainm a úsáid chun críocha pobail agus taighde AAC (coimeádfar cuntais neamhúsáidte níos faide nuair a bheidh sé seo cumasaithe) [[ Allow anonymized log data to be used for AAC community and research purposes (unused accounts will be kept longer when this is enabled)
include_geo_in_logs: Cuir geolocation san áireamh i logaí Mód Labhair [[ Include geolocation in Speak Mode logs
logging_uses_google: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Nuair a bheidh logáil cumasaithe, seolfar sonraí úsáide gan ainm chuig seirbhísí Google agus cairteacha tuairisce á nginiúint. Nuair a bhíonn logáil díchumasaithe, ní dhéanfar rianú sprice agus dámhachtainí suaitheantais a nuashonrú toisc nach ndéanfar aon sonraí a logáil. [[ NOTE: When logging is enabled, anonymous usage data will be sent to Google services when generating report charts. When logging is disabled, goal tracking and badge awards will not update since no data will be logged.
allow_cookies_checkbox: Is féidir le %app_name% mo ghníomhartha agus amhairc leathanaigh a rianú chun críocha inmheánacha amhail láimhseáil earráidí, feabhas a chur ar ghnéithe agus rianú treochtaí [[ %app_name% can track my actions and pageviews for internal purposes like error handling, improving features and tracking trends

phrase_categories_explainer: Tá catagóirí "Quick" agus "Journal" ag CoughDrop de réir réamhshocraithe, ach is féidir leat níos mó catagóirí a liostú anseo. [[ CoughDrop has "Quick" and "Journal" categories by default, but you can list more categories to add here.

support_intro: Stumpáilte? Rud nach bhfuil ag obair mar a cheapann tú ba chóir? Táimid i gcónaí ag cuardach bealaí le %app_name% a fheabhsú! Inis dúinn le do thoil cad a cheapann tú, cad atá briste, nó cad ba mhaith leat a fheiceáil níos éasca. [[ Stumped? Something not working like you think it should? We're always on the lookout for ways to make %app_name% better! Please tell us what you think, what's broken, or what you'd like to see made easier.

==== lvl4 ============: Below are all words for priority level 4 (this string does not need to be translated)
remember_fallbacks: Tá ábhar préimhe ag an mbord seo, feicfidh aon úsáideoir a fhaigheann rochtain air gan rochtain préimhe roghanna eile saor in aisce ina ionad sin. [[ This board has premium content, any users who access it without premium access will see free alternatives instead.
board_save_failed: Theip ar an gclár a shábháil [[ Failed to save board
deleted_board_restored: Clár scriosta athchóirithe go leagan ó %{d} [[ Deleted board restored to version from %{d}
board_restored: Chuaigh an Bord ar ais go leagan ó %{d} [[ Board reverted to version from %{d}
copies_loading_error: Tharla earráid gan choinne agus cóipeanna den chlár seo á luchtú [[ There was an unexpected error trying to load copies of this board
anyone_can_see: Is féidir le duine ar bith an bord seo a fheiceáil [[ Anyone can see this board
this_board_is_private: Tá an bord seo príobháideach [[ This board is private
shows_word_completion_suggestions: Taispeánann sé moltaí críochnaithe focal [[ Shows word completion suggestions
protected_fallback_material: Úsáideann an bord seo sócmhainní den scoth nach bhfuil rochtain agat orthu mar sin feicfidh tú íomhánna agus fuaimeanna saor in aisce a d'fhéadfadh nach dtagann go foirfe le hintinn an údair [[ This board uses premium assets which you don't have access to so you will see free images and sounds which may not perfectly match the author's intent
board_contains_protected_material: Tá ábhar cosanta ar an mbord seo, agus ní féidir é a phoibliú [[ This board contains protected material, and cannot be made public
board_contains_protected_material_will_u: Tá ábhar cosanta ar an mbord seo nach féidir a phoibliú. Má roinntear an clár seo nó má dhéantar é a phoibliú, feicfidh úsáideoirí nach bhfuil rochtain cheart acu íomhánna agus fuaimeanna saor in aisce ina n-ionad, seans nach mbeidh siad ag teacht go foirfe le hintinn an údair. [[ This board contains protected material which cannot be made public. If this board is shared or made public, users without proper access will see free images and sounds instead which may not perfectly match the author's intent.
people_using: Daoine Ag baint úsáide as [[ People Using
retrieved_from_local: aisghabháil ó stóráil áitiúil [[ retrieved from local storage
unlinked_buttons: Cnaipí Iomlána Neamhnasctha [[ Total Unlinked Buttons

loading_linked_boards: Cláir nasctha á lódáil... [[ Loading linked boards...
error_getting_linked_boards: Tharla earráid agus cláir nasctha a aisghabháil [[ There was an error trying to retrieve linked boards
board_deleted: Tá an bord seo scriosta. [[ This board has been deleted.
review_edit_history: Athbhreithnigh an stair eagarthóireachta don chlár seo. [[ Review the edit history for this board.
board_doesnt_exist: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil an bord seo ann. Seiceáil an nasc a thug anseo thú chun a chinntiú go bhfuil sé ceart. [[ It looks like this board doesn't exist. Please check the link that brought you here to make sure it's correct.
no_permissions: Níl cead agat rochtain a fháil ar an gclár seo, nó níl sé ar fáil faoi láthair. [[ You don't have permission to access this board, or it isn't currently available.
board_not_synced: Níl an clár seo ar fáil, nó níor sioncronaíodh é le haghaidh úsáide as líne. [[ This board isn't available, or hasn't been synced for offline use.
possible_upstream_boards: Boird a fhéadfaidh nasc a dhéanamh anseo: [[ Boards that may link here:
versions_explanation: Seo liosta de na hamanna ar fad a d’athraigh an bord seo, agus cé a rinne an t-athrú: [[ Here's a listing of all the times this board has changed, and who made the change:
rollback_to_version_before: Fill ar ais ar an leagan is déanaí roimhe seo (teoranta go dtí 6 mhí anuas): [[ Roll back newest version before (limited to last 6 months):

maybe_more: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: d'fhéadfadh go mbeadh níos mó torthaí ann nach dtaispeántar [[ NOTE: there may be more results not shown

eye_tracking_beta: Gné béite ar Windows nó ar chóras cúrsóir-bhunaithe eile is ea rianú súl nó lorg dwell, téigh i dteagmháil leis an bhfoireann tacaíochta le haghaidh tuilleadh eolais [[ Eye-gaze or dwell tracking is a beta feature on Windows or other cursor-based system, please contact support for more information
ios_eye_tracking: Tacaíonn gnéithe ionsuite Apple Face ID le rialú teoranta amharc súl. Níl an radharc súl seo chomh cruinn le crua-earraí tiomnaithe rianaithe súl, ach in éineacht le gluaiseacht ceann teoranta d'fhéadfadh sé gur leor é do roinnt cumarsáide. [[ The built-in features of Apple Face ID support limited eye gaze control. This eye gaze is not as accurate as dedicated eye-tracking hardware, but combined with limited head movement it may be sufficient for some communicators.
ios_gaze_tracking: Tacaíonn gnéithe ionsuite Apple Face ID le rialú teoranta amharc súl. I gcás feistí gan Aghaidh Aitheantais bainfear úsáid as rianaitheoir ceann ceamara-bhunaithe. [[ The built-in features of Apple Face ID support limited eye gaze control. For devices without Face ID a camera-based head tracker will be used.
supported_eye_trackers: Oibreoidh go leor lorgairí súl i %app_name% ag baint úsáide as modh rialaithe cúrsóra nó ag baint úsáide as comhtháthú ionsuite (EyeX, Eyegaze Edge). Mura bhfuil aon lorgairí dúchasacha ar fáil is féidir lorgaire súl ceamara-bhunaithe ar chaighdeán níos ísle a úsáid. [[ Many eye trackers will work in %app_name% using cursor control mode or using a built-in integrate (EyeX, Eyegaze Edge). If no native trackers are available then a lower-quality camera-based eye tracker can be used.
eyegaze_windows_only_1: Ní oibreoidh rianaithe súl comhtháite ach amháin sa [[ Integrated eye trackers will only work in the
eyegaze_windows_only_2: Más féidir le do lorgaire súl cúrsóir na luiche a rialú, is féidir leat triail a bhaint as rianú dwell ina ionad sin. [[ If your eye tracker can control the mouse cursor, you can try dwell tracking instead.
ios_head_tracking: Tacaíonn gnéithe ionsuite Apple Face ID le rianú ceann dúchais. I gcás feistí gan Aghaidh Aitheantais bainfear úsáid as rianaitheoir ceann ceamara-bhunaithe. [[ The built-in features of Apple Face ID support native head tracking. For devices without Face ID a camera-based head tracker will be used.
supported_head_trackers: Tacaíonn roinnt gléasanna le rianú ceann optamaithe le crua-earraí mar chuid de thacair uirlisí AR, agus le haghaidh gach feiste eile bainfear úsáid as rianaitheoir ceann ceamara-bhunaithe. [[ Some devices support hardware-optimized head tracking as part of AR toolsets, for all other devices a camera-based head tracker will be used.

apple_tts_bug: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Tá fabht in inneall cainte Apple a fhágann nach n-oibreoidh roinnt guthanna córais. Má tá sé seo ag tarlú duit, bain triail as Guth Préimh a úsáid nó roghnaigh "Guth Réamhshocraithe Córais" chun an fhadhb a réiteach. [[ NOTE: There is a bug in Apple's speech engine which can cause some system voices not to work. If this is happening for you, try using a Premium Voice or selecting "System Default Voice" to get around the problem.

valet_login_explainer: Ligeann logáil isteach Valet duit ainm úsáideora agus pasfhocal sealadach a roinnt lasmuigh de ghléas iontaofa gan do chuntas iomlán a nochtadh. Nuair a úsáideann duine éigin do logáil isteach valet, beidh rochtain ag an ngléas sin ar chláir agus ar shainroghanna úsáideora amháin, cosúil le cuntas samhaltaithe amháin. Fanfaidh an pasfhocal valet ar fáil ar feadh 24 uair an chloig nó go dtí go logálann tú isteach ag baint úsáide as do ghnáth-ainm úsáideora agus pasfhocal. Ina dhiaidh sin díchumasófar é go dtí go ndéanfaidh tú é a athghníomhú de láimh. [[ Valet login allows you to share a temporary username and password outside of a trusted device without exposing your full account. When someone uses your valet login, that device will have access to boards and user preferences only, similar to a modeling-only account. The valet password will remain available for 24 hours or until you log in using your normal username and password. After that it will be disabled until you manually re-activate it.

goals_explainer1: Is bealach iad na spriocanna chun cabhrú leis an gcumarsálaí agus lena bhfoireann tacaíochta a straitéisí reatha a choinneáil i mbarr a réime. Is féidir leo a bheith ginearálta cosúil le "Cuimhnigh focail lárnacha a úsáid!" nó sainiúil ar nós "Bain úsáid as beannachtaí agus tú ag dul isteach i suíomh nua". Cuimhnigh gur féidir gur spriocanna iad seo don chumarsáidí ("Freagair ceisteanna agus tá nó níl"), nó don fhoireann tacaíochta timpeall an chumarsáide ("Úsáid ordlathas leideanna"). [[ Goals are a way to help the communicator and their support team keep their current strategies top of mind. They can be general like "Remember to use core words!" or specific like "Use greetings when entering a new setting". Remember, these can be goals for the communicator ("Answer questions with yes or no"), or for the support team around the communicator ("Use a prompting hierarchy").
goals_explainer2: Is féidir spriocanna a rianú do gach cumarsáidí trí úsáid a bhaint as measúnuithe, nó nuair a bhíonn nótaí á ndéanamh ar logaí úsáideora. Úsáidtear na nuashonruithe stádais seo ansin chun tuairisc ghinearálta a thaispeáint ar an gcaoi a bhfuil an sprioc ag dul chun cinn le himeacht ama. [[ Goals can be tracked for each communicator using assessments, or when making notes on a user's logs. These status updates are then used to show a general report of how the goal is progessing over time.
goals_explainer_3: Is féidir leat tosú ag baint úsáide as spriocanna ag am ar bith trí sprioc a chruthú do chumarsáidí. Ansin bain úsáid as nótaí agus measúnuithe chun dul chun cinn i dtreo na sprice a rianú le himeacht ama. Is féidir le húsáideoirí spriocanna iolracha a bheith acu, ach gan ach sprioc "bunscoile" amháin ag an am. [[ You can start using goals at any time by creating a goal for a communicator. Then use notes and assessments to track progress toward the goal over time. Users can have multiple goals, but only one "primary" goal at a time.
goals_explainer_4: Le haghaidh tuilleadh eolais ar roghnú spriocanna maithe, seiceáil amach iad seo acmhainní iontacha ó PrAACtical AAC. [[ For more information on choosing good goals, please check out these great resources from PrAACtical AAC.

eval_intro: Fáilte chuig an Uirlis Eval! Cuidíonn an uirlis seo le cumas cumarsáideora chun cnaipí, siombailí agus coincheapa a rochtain agus a thuiscint, a mheas. [[ Welcome to the Eval Tool! This tool helps evaluate a communicator's ability to access and understand buttons, symbols and concepts.
eval_intro_2: Is féidir leat an roghchlár ar bharr ar dheis a úsáid chun an mheastóireacht a chríochnú nó a chumrú am ar bith. Is féidir leat nótaí a chur leis freisin nuair a bheidh an mheastóireacht críochnaithe. [[ You can use the top right menu to end or configure the evaluation any time. You can also add notes once the evaluation has completed.
find_target_intro: Léiríonn an chuid seo sprioc aonair ag láithreacha agus méideanna éagsúla chun cabhrú le measúnú a dhéanamh ar chumas spriocanna a aithint agus a rochtain. [[ This section shows a single target at different locations and sizes to help assess ability to identify and access targets.
diff_target_intro: Taispeánann an chuid seo spriocanna iolracha ar mhéideanna agus ar leagan amach éagsúla chun cumas idirdhealú a dhéanamh amach. [[ This section shows multiple targets at different sizes and layouts to determine ability to differentiate.
symbols_intro: Taispeánann an chuid seo stíleanna éagsúla pictiúr féachaint an bhfuil níos mó ratha ag an úsáideoir le stíl amháin thar ceann eile [[ This section shows different styles of pictures to see if the user has more success with one style over another
find_show_intro: Taispeánann an chuid seo grianghraf nó coincheap agus spreagann sé an t-úsáideoir chun an tsiombail chomhfhreagrach thíos a aimsiú [[ This section shows a photograph or concept and prompts the user to find the corresponding symbol below
open_ended_intro: Léiríonn an chuid seo radhairc shimplí. Spreag an t-úsáideoir le breathnuithe a dhéanamh nó an radharc a phlé ag baint úsáide as na cnaipí/eochracha atá ar fáil [[ This section shows simple scenes. Encourage the user to make observations or discuss the scene using the buttons/keys provided
categories_intro: Taispeánann an rannán seo grianghraif agus spreagann sé an t-úsáideoir iad a rangú bunaithe ar a gcatagóir [[ This section shows photographs and prompts the user to classify them based on their category
inclusion_exclusion_association_intro: Taispeánann an rannán seo grianghraif agus spreagann sé an t-úsáideoir míreanna gaolmhara nó neamhghaolmhara a aithint [[ This section shows photographs and prompts the user to identify related or unrelated items
literacy_intro: Taispeánann an chuid seo íomhá agus liosta d’fhocail fhéideartha (gan íomhánna) le seiceáil le haghaidh scileanna léitheoireachta [[ This section shows an image and a list of possible words (without images) to check for reading skills
done_eval: Déanta! Buail an cnaipe deiridh chun an mheastóireacht a shábháil agus na torthaí a fheiceáil! [[ Done! Hit the final button to save the evaluation and see the results!

custom_goal: Sainmhíneoidh mé Mo Sprioc Féin [[ I Will Define My Own Goal
buttons_explainer: Tá úsáid chomhsheasmhach tábhachtach! Ní rud í an chumarsáid a tharlaíonn in aon áit amháin, agus chun go mbeidh cumarsáidí líofa ag baint úsáide as a ngléas ní mór dóibh í a bheith amuigh agus ar fáil i rith an lae, in áiteanna agus i gcásanna éagsúla. [[ Consistent usage is important! Communication isn't something that just happens in one location, and for communicators to get proficient using their device they need to have it out and available throughout the day, in different locations and situations.
words_explainer: Faoi láthair tá sprioc agat díriú ar na nithe seo a leanas: [[ Right now you have a goal to focus on the following:
modeling_explainer: Is éard is samhaltú ann ná an próiseas ina dtaispeántar don chumarsáideoir conas a d’fhéadfadh sé/sí rudaí a rá leis an ngléas cumarsáide a úsáid. Cosúil le cumarsáid labhartha, is minic a thógann sé go leor cumarsáide múnlaithe sula n-éiríonn cumarsáidí compordach ina n-aonar, mar sin bí ag faire amach do go leor deiseanna chun eiseamláiriú a dhéanamh i dtimpeallachtaí agus amanna éagsúla den lá. [[ Modeling is the process of showing a communicator how they could say things user their communication device. Just like with spoken communication, it often takes a lot of modeled communication before a communicator gets comfortable on their own, so look for many opportunities to model in different environments and times of day.

board_intro_explainer: Is féidir leat ceacht gairid a thógáil a shiúlfaidh daoine tríd nuair a roghnaíonn siad an clár seo, lena n-áirítear mínithe agus frásaí a chleachtadh dóibh le fáil ag baint úsáide as an gclár cláir. finding_a_home_board: An Bord Baile Ceart a Fháil [[ Finding the Right Home Board
finding_home_board1: Agus uirlis chumarsáide á úsáid agat, is é an bord baile do phointe tosaigh chun roinnt rudaí a rá go tapa ach freisin léim isteach i dtopaicí níos doimhne. Tá sé tábhachtach áit tosaigh mhaith a bheith agat, ach tá go leor stíleanna éagsúla de chláir chumarsáide amuigh ansin, agus ní bhíonn sé soiléir i gcónaí cé acu is fearr. Tá gach duine difriúil. Seo roinnt stíleanna éagsúla de bhoird tí le roinnt sonraí maidir le cén fáth a bhféadfadh siad a bheith úsáideach. [[ When using a communication tool, the home board is your starting point to say some things quickly but also jump off into deeper topics. It's important to have a good starting place, but there's lots of different styles of communication boards out there, and it's not always clear which is the best. Every person is different. Here are some different styles of home boards with some detail about why they might be useful.
finding_home_board2: Nuair a fhaigheann tú bord baile a bhfuil ciall leis, buail an roghchlár agus roghnaigh "Socraigh mar Bhaile" chun é a dhéanamh mar do bhord baile. [[ When you find a home board that makes sense, hit the menu and choose "Set as Home" to make it your home board.

supverisor_intro: Tá maoirseoirí nasctha le cuntas úsáideora agus is féidir rochtain iomlán a bheith acu ar chuntas an úsáideora. Is féidir leo a mbord baile a athrú, a gcuid boird phríobháideacha a fheiceáil agus a chur in eagar, tuairiscí a fheiceáil, srl. Is féidir leis a bheith luachmhar do theiripeoirí, do thuismitheoirí, etc. a chur leis mar mhaoirseoirí, ach cuimhnigh go bhfuil rochtain iomlán ag maoirseoirí, mar sin bí ar an eolas faoi cé. cuireann tú mar mhaoirseoirí. [[ Supervisors are linked to a user's account and can have full access to the user's account. They can change their home board, see and edit their private boards, see reports, etc. It can be valuable for therapists, parents, etc. to be added as supervisors, but remember that supervisors have full account access, so be aware of who you add as supervisors.

troubleshooting_intro: Is féidir leis an uirlis seo cabhrú le tástáil le haghaidh feidhmiúlacht a bhfuiltear ag súil léi nó a theastaíonn le go bhfeidhmeoidh %app_name% i gceart. Rithfidh roinnt tástálacha go huathoibríoch, agus d’fhéadfadh go mbeadh tástáil láimhe de dhíth ar chinn eile. Má thagann tú trasna ar aon rud gan choinne, le do thoil buail an nasc ‘Tacaíocht’ ag bun an leathanaigh agus cuir in iúl an fhadhb. gift_explainer: Is féidir le %app_name% a bheith ina uirlis chumhachtach chun cumarsáidí a fhorbairt. Má tá aithne agat ar dhuine a d’fhéadfadh leas a bhaint as rochtain ar %app_name%, is féidir leat ballraíocht a cheannach ar a son. Nuair a dhéanfaidh tú sin gheobhaidh tú ríomhphost le cód bronntanais is féidir a úsáid chun do bhronntanas a fhuascailt d'úsáideoir %app_name%. [[ %app_name% can be a powerful tool for developing communicators. If you know someone who could benefit from access to %app_name%, you can purchase a membership on their behalf. When you do you will receive an email with a gift code that can be used to redeem your gift for a %app_name% user.
purchase_complete: Ceannaigh críochnaithe! Go raibh maith agat! [[ Purchase complete! Thank you!
gift_code_in_email: Ba cheart go bhfaighfeá ríomhphost leis an gcód bronntanais a bhaineann leis an gceannach seo. Is féidir leat an ríomhphost a chur ar aghaidh chuig an bhfaighteoir beartaithe, nó teacht ar bhealach níos cruthaithí chun an cód a fháil (cluinim trumpaí ag déanamh rudaí spreagúil). Déan cinnte do bhosca turscair a sheiceáil mura bhfeiceann tú an ríomhphost ag teacht tríd laistigh de chúpla nóiméad. [[ You should receive an email with the gift code associated with this purchase. You can forward the email to the intended recipient, or come up with a more creative way to get the code to them (I hear trumpets make things exciting). Make sure to check your spam box if you're not seeing the email come through within a few minutes.

Más féidir leat níos mó a íoc, cabhróidh do ranníocaíocht le %app_name% a bhronnadh ar theaghlaigh bhreise i ngátar! inflections_review_tool: Uirlis Athbhreithnithe Inflections [[ Inflections Review Tool
inflections_tool_explainer: Is uirlis foinse oscailte é CoughDrop a thacaíonn le hiliomad teangacha agus idirghníomhaíochtaí. Ligeann an Uirlis Athbhreithnithe Inflections dúinn faisnéis a bhailiú ó fhoinsí iolracha agus muid ag tógáil amach liostaí focal teanga. Cuidíonn eolas cruinn ar fhoirmeacha focal linn tacaíocht níos fearr a thabhairt dár bpobail. Cuimhnigh, déanfar an fhaisnéis go léir a bhailíonn an uirlis seo a scaoileadh saor in aisce ar líne le ceadúnas oscailte do dhaoine eile le húsáid agus le leas a bhaint aisti. [[ CoughDrop is an open source tool that supports multiple languages and interactions. This Inflections Review Tool allows us to collect information from multiple sources as we build out language word lists. Having accurate information on word forms helps us better support our communities. Remember, all information collected by this tool will be released for free online with an open license for others to use and benefit from.
inflections_tips: TIPS: Tá cineálacha iolracha ag roinnt focal. Tá cineálacha malartacha áirithe chomh doiléir sin nach fiú go mór iad a áireamh, smaoinigh ar cad a déarfadh cainteoir meánach. Má tá an focal infhillte cheana féin ("lorg") déan cinnte a fhréamh ("féach") a chur isteach sa chéad bhosca. Ní bhíonn ciall le roinnt infhilleadh do bhriathra/dobhriathar áirithe, cuir “N/B” sa bhosca le do thoil. Maidir le codarsnachtaí, déan an ceann is soiléire más ann dóibh. Mura bhfuil tú cinnte faoi fhocal, ná bíodh eagla ort é a scipeáil! [[ TIPS: Some words have multiple types. Some alternate types are so obscure that they're not really worth including, think about what an average speaker might say. If the word is already inflected ("looking") make sure to enter its root ("look") in the first box. Some inflections for certain verbs/adverbs don't make sense, please put "N/A" in the box. For opposites, just do the most obvious if any. If you're unsure about a word, don't be afraid to skip it!

error_loading_words: Tharla earráid agus focail á lódáil [[ There was an error loading words

trends_explainer: Is féidir le húsáideoirí %app_name% diúltú a gcuid sonraí úsáide a thaifeadadh le haghaidh anailíse agus tagartha pearsanta agus foirne. Aon uair a roghnaíonn duine logáil sonraí, iarraimid freisin an mbeadh siad sásta taifead gan ainm dá sonraí úsáide a roinnt le taighdeoirí neamhspleácha. Comhoibrímid le heagraíochtaí taighde neamhbhrabúis chun anailís iomlán a dhéanamh ar na sonraí seo chun léargais níos fearr a sholáthar ar úsáid AAC agus chun imscrúdú a dhéanamh ar conas is féidir tacaíochtaí a fheabhsú. [[ %app_name% users can opt-in to recording their usage data for personal and team analysis and reference. Whenever someone opts-in to data logging, we also ask if they would be willing to share an anonymized record of their usage data with independent researchers. We collaborate with non-profit research organizations to analyze this data in aggregate to provide better insights into AAC use and to investigate how supports can be improved.
trends_explainer2: Más spéis leat taighde AAC a dhéanamh, smaoinigh ar dhul i dteagmháil linn le tuilleadh a fhoghlaim faoin tionscadal tábhachtach seo. Seo thíos roinnt samplaí de na cineálacha sonraí is féidir a bhailiú, gan ainm agus go comhiomlán, chun cabhrú le taighde AAC. Tá an fhaisnéis úsáide focal ar fad bunaithe ar shonraí comhiomlána amháin ó úsáideoirí a roghnaigh isteach i dtaighde agus tuairisciú gan ainm. [[ If you are interested in conducting AAC research, please consider reaching out to us to learn more about this important project. Below are some examples of the types of data that can be collected, anonymously and in aggregate, to help aid AAC research. All word usage information is based on aggregate data only from users who have opted in to anonymized research and reporting.

welcome_to_speak_mode: Fáilte go Mód Labhair! [[ Welcome to Speak Mode!
speak_mode_intro_1: Is é Mód Labhair an chuid is tábhachtaí de %app_name%! Nuair atá tú i Mód Labhair, is féidir leat aon chnaipe a bhuail chun é a chur leis an mbosca ag an mbarr. Ag brath ar do shocruithe, labhróidh sé freisin na cnaipí agus tú ag bualadh orthu. Is féidir leat an bosca ag an mbarr a bhualadh chun an abairt iomlán a labhairt, nó na cnaipí eile a úsáid chun filleadh abhaile, cúlspás nó an bosca a ghlanadh. [[ Speak Mode is the most important part of %app_name%! When you are in Speak Mode, you can hit any button to add it to the box at the top. Depending on your settings, it will also speak the buttons as you hit them. You can hit the box at the top to speak the whole sentence, or use the other buttons to return home, backspace or clear the box.
speak_mode_intro_2: Nuair is mian leat Mód Speak a fhágáil buail an roghchlár sa chúinne uachtarach ar dheis agus roghnaigh "Scoir Mód Labhair". Ansin is féidir leat bord baile a phiocadh, athruithe a dhéanamh ar bhoird, roghanna úsáideoirí a athrú, tuarascálacha úsáide a sheiceáil, etc. [[ When you want to exit Speak Mode just hit the menu in the top right corner and select "Exit Speak Mode". Then you can pick a home board, make changes to boards, change user preferences, check out usage reports, etc.
integration_details: Sonraí Uirlis Nasctha [[ Connected Tool Details
connected_tool_details: Tá na comharthaí seo a leanas riachtanach chun an uirlis nasctha seo a rochtain agus faisnéis a fháil ó CoughDrop. Ba cheart duit na comharthaí seo a chóipeáil síos, mar ní bheidh siad le feiceáil arís sa todhchaí. [[ The following tokens are necessary for this connected tool to access and receive information from CoughDrop. You should copy these tokens down, as they will not be visible again in the future.
compare_notes: Tá go leor aipeanna agus gléasanna cumarsáide amuigh ansin, agus uaireanta bíonn sé deacair a fháil amach cad a oibríonn go maith do do chumarsáidí. Ní ritheann roinnt aipeanna ach ar iPad agus ní oibreoidh cuid acu le crua-earraí nó beidh saincheapadh teoranta acu. Ba mhaith linn a chinntiú go bhfuil gach rud ar féidir le %app_name% a thairiscint ar eolas agat, mar sin tá an chairt chomparáide thíos curtha le chéile againn. [[ There are lots of communication apps and devices out there, and sometimes it's hard to know what will work well for your communicator. Some apps only run on an iPad and some won't work with hardware or have limited customization. We want to make sure you know everything %app_name% can offer, so we've put together the comparison chart below.
core_board_templates: Bunrang Stór Focal Tosaigh [[ Core Vocabulary Starters
keyboard_with_word_prediction: Méarchlár Le Focal Réamhamhairc [[ Keyboard With Word Prediction
