via_usb_drive: via USB tiomáint [[ via USB drive
via_usb_Drive: via USB tiomáint [[ via USB drive
share_boards: Comhroinn Boird Le hÚsáideoirí Eile [[ Share Boards With Other Users
any_windows_computer: Aon ríomhaire Windows [[ Any Windows Computer
supported_peripherals: Rochtain Malartach Tacaithe [[ Supported Alternative Access
proud_of_features: Mar a fheiceann tú, táimid bródúil go leor as gach rud is féidir le %app_name% a dhéanamh. Theastaigh uainn rud éigin a thógáil a d'fhéadfadh fanacht le cumarsáidí de réir mar a fhorbraíonn agus a athraíonn a gcuid riachtanas le himeacht ama, agus mar sin tá go leor saincheaptha ionsuite chun cabhrú le tacú le riachtanais gach duine. [[ As you can see, we're pretty proud of everything %app_name% can do. We wanted to build something that could stay with communicators as their needs develop and change over time, so there are a lot of customizations built-in to help support the needs of each individual.
please_share_coughdrop: Ar bís leis an méid a fheiceann tú? Roinn %app_name% le daoine eile le do thoil chun an dea-scéal a scaipeadh! [[ Excited by what you see? Please share %app_name% with others to help spread the good word!
read_to_try_it_out: Réidh chun triail a bhaint as tú féin? [[ Ready to try it out yourself?
sign_up_for_account: Cláraigh le haghaidh cuntas %app_name% [[ Sign up for a %app_name% account
to_see_coughdrop_for_yourself: féachaint cé chomh cumhachtach agus solúbtha atá %app_name% i ndáiríre! [[ to see how powerful and flexible %app_name% really is!
bad_board_import: Tharla earráid agus do chlár á iompórtáil. Cinntigh le do thoil gur uaslódáil tú comhad bailí agus bain triail eile as. [[ There was an error importing your boards. Please make sure you uploaded a valid file and try again.
import_board_finished_redirecting: Iompórtáil críochnaithe! Ba cheart thú a threorú chuig an mbord nua... [[ Import finished! You should be directed to the new board...
importing_boards_please_wait: Cláir a iompórtáil, d’fhéadfadh go dtógfadh sé seo cúpla nóiméad... [[ Importing boards, this could take a few minutes...
notifications_settings: Mar mhaoirseoir, beidh rochtain agat ar bhoird agus ar thuarascálacha úsáide do na cumarsáidí lena n-oibríonn tú. Más mian leat, is féidir leat fógraí a chur ar siúl freisin, agus nuashonruithe rialta a fháil ar dhul chun cinn an chumarsáide, nó fiú diúltú do theachtaireachtaí téacs a fháil ó chumarsáidí a chuir tú isteach mar mhaoirseoir. [[ As a supervisor, you'll have access to boards and usage reports for the communicators you work with. If you'd like, you can also turn on notifications, and receive regular updates on communicator progress, or even opt-in to receiving text messages from communicators that have added you as a supervisor.
communicator_notifications: Nuair a bhíonn logáil cumasaithe, is féidir leat rogha a dhéanamh ríomhphoist rialta a fháil le sonraí faoi chumarsáid thar am, lena n-áirítear spriocanna reatha agus úsáid focal. Is féidir leis seo cabhrú le gach duine a choinneáil ar an leathanach céanna agus is féidir leis a bheith ina uirlis luachmhar chun cuidiú le cumarsáidí dul chun cinn leanúnach a dhéanamh. [[ When logging is enabled, you can opt to receive regular emails with details on communication over time, including current goals and word usage. This can help keep everyone on the same page and can be a valuable tool is helping communicators make continual progress.
summary_emails: Cé chomh minic is mian leat ríomhphoist achoimre? [[ How often do you want summary emails?
comm_preference: Conas ba mhaith leat do chumarsáidí teachtaireacht a thabhairt duit? [[ How would you like communicators to message you?
via_text: Mar Teachtaireachtaí Téacs [[ As Text Messages
via_email: Mar Theachtaireachtaí Ríomhphoist [[ As Email Messages
via_dashboard: Mar Fhógraí Deais [[ As Dashboard Notifications
available_under_profile: Is féidir leat iad seo agus roghanna fógraí eile a athrú faoin rannán "Próifíl" de "Mo Chuntas" am ar bith. [[ You can change these and other notification preferences under the "Profile" section of "My Account" at any time.
youre_all_set_again: Tá tú réidh (Arís)! [[ You're All Set (Again)!
done_setup_2: Anois, ba cheart go mbeadh a fhios agat gach rud atá uait le tosú ag úsáid %app_name%! Má éiríonn tú stumpa riamh, is féidir leat an nasc “Tacaíocht” a bhualadh ar an deais i gcónaí chun rochtain a fháil ar do chainéal YouTube nó ar Threoracha Mar Atá. Ádh mór! [[ Now you should know everything you need to get started using %app_name%! If you ever get stumped, you can always hit the "Support" link on the dashboard to access your YouTube channel or How-To Guides. Good luck!
return_to_dashboard: Fill ar an Deais [[ Return to the Dashboard
watch_video: Féach ar an Físeán Oiliúna [[ Watch the Training Video
usage_1: Is uirlis é %app_name% chun cainte a ghiniúint. Is féidir leat cnaipí a bhualadh chun focail nó abairtí a labhairt, nó chun focail a litriú. [[ %app_name% is a tool for generating speech. You can hit buttons to speak words or sentences, or to spell words.
usage_2: Ní le haghaidh cumarsáide neamhbhriathartha amháin atá %app_name%. Tá roinnt cumarsáidí fós ag foghlaim, nó níl cabhair uathu ach cuid den am, agus d'fhéadfadh gur uirlis tacaíochta iontach é "crutch" AAC cosúil le %app_name%. [[ %app_name% isn't just for nonverbal communicators. Some communicators are still learning, or need help only some of the time, and having an AAC "crutch" like %app_name% can be a great support tool.
usage_3: Is féidir le %app_name% rith ar chóras ar bith. Is féidir leat é a fháil sna siopaí feidhmchláir mar íoslódáil saor in aisce, nó an aip Windows a shuiteáil nó é a úsáid i do bhrabhsálaí gréasáin. Bain úsáid as cibé gléas is mian leat. [[ %app_name% can run on any system. You can find it in the major app stores as a free download, or install the Windows app or use it in your web browser. Use whatever device you like.
usage_4: Bíonn imní ar roinnt daoine nach labhróidh cumarsáidí a úsáideann AAC go deo as a stuaim féin. Mar sin féin, tá sé léirithe ag taighde le déanaí go dtéann go leor úsáideoirí AAC ar aghaidh chuig cumarsáid ghutha nuair a bhíonn siad níos compordaí nó níos oilte. [[ Some people worry that communicators who use AAC will never speak on their own. However, recent research has shown that many AAC users move on to vocal communication once they are more comfortable or proficient.
picking_a_home_board: Bord Tí a Phiocadh [[ Picking a Home Board
home_boards_1: Tá gach duine uathúil, mar sin is minic a bheidh stór stór focal gach cumarsáide uathúil dóibh freisin. Le %app_name% is féidir leat sraith tosaithe a phiocadh (nó do chuid féin a thógáil), agus é a phearsantú arís agus arís eile. [[ Everyone is unique, so often each communicator's vocabulary set will be unique to them too. With %app_name% you can pick a starter set (or build your own), and personalize it over and over again.
home_boards_2: Is é an rud is tábhachtaí ná pleanáil a dhéanamh leis an deireadh i gcuimhne. Más cosúil le cumarsáidí beidh siad in ann fás ina stór focal mór, in ionad tosú le líon beag cnaipí agus níos mó a chur leis le himeacht ama, b'fhéidir go mbeadh sé níos éasca tosú le líon mór cnaipí agus gan ach cuid de na cnaipí a cheilt. cnaipí chun tús a chur amach. [[ The important thing is to plan with the end in mind. If a communicator seems like they'll be able to grow into a large vocabulary, instead of starting with a small number of buttons and adding more over time, it may be easier to start with a large number of buttons and just hide some of the buttons to start out.
supervisors_1: In %app_name%, tugtar "maoirseoirí" ar an bhfoireann tacaíochta timpeall an chumarsáide. Is úsáideoirí iad maoirseoirí atá ag samhaltú le haghaidh cumarsáide agus ag obair le cumarsáidí. Tá a logáil isteach féin acu, agus d'fhéadfadh sé a bheith ina mhúinteoir nó ina theiripeoir, ina thuismitheoir, ina cúramóir, etc. [[ In %app_name%, the support team around the communicator are called "supervisors". Supervisors are users that are modeling for and working with a communicator. They have their own login, and might be a teacher or a therapist, a parent, a caregiver, etc.
supervisors_2: Cuirtear maoirseoirí lena gcuntas cumarsáide, agus is féidir leo cláir chumarsáide a fheiceáil ar a ngléasanna féin, ionas gur féidir leo a bheith compordach le stór focal úsáideora le haghaidh samhaltú níos fearr, agus is féidir leo cnaipí agus frásaí nua a chur leis má tá cead eagarthóireachta acu. [[ Supervisors are added to their communicator's account, and can see a communicator's boards on their own devices, so they can get comfortable with a user's vocabulary for better modeling, and can add new buttons and phrases if they have editing permission.
modeling_on_boards: Samhaltú ar Bhoird [[ Modeling on Boards
boards_1: Tagann %app_name% le go leor stíleanna éagsúla clár. De réir mar a oibríonn tú le cumarsáidí éagsúla b’fhéidir go dtiocfaidh tú trasna ar stíleanna agus leagan amach cláir éagsúla. Is féidir le gach cumarsáidí leas a bhaint as an lucht tacaíochta a bheith mórthimpeall orthu samhaltú conas % app_name% a úsáid [[ %app_name% comes with many different styles of boards. As you work with different communicators you may come across different board styles and layouts. Every communicator can benefit from having the supporters around them model how to use %app_name%
board_2: Uirlis iontach chun teanga a fhoghlaim is ea an samhaltú. Tá sé léirithe ag taighde go mbíonn rath níos fearr ar úsáideoirí AAC a bhfuil daoine ag samhaltú dóibh ag glacadh le AAC agus ag déanamh cumarsáide trí úsáid a bhaint as. [[ Modeling is a great tool to language learning. Research has shown that AAC users who have people modeling for them have better success adopting and communicating using AAC.
board_3: Tá samhaltú éasca! Níl le déanamh agat ach cnaipí a bhualadh ar an scáileán agus tú ag caint leis an gcumarsáid. Taispeáin dóibh conas is féidir leo na cnaipí atá ar fáil acu a úsáid chun iad féin a chur in iúl. Ná ní hamháin iarratais a shamhaltú, múnlaigh gach cineál smaointe, smaointe, tuairimí agus ceisteanna! Dá mhéad a mhúnlaíonn tú, is amhlaidh is mó samplaí a thugann tú don chumarsáidí maidir le bealaí bailí a cheapann tú chun a ngléas a úsáid. [[ Modeling is easy! All you do is hit buttons on the screen as you talk to the communicator. Show them how they can use the buttons they have available to express themselves. Don't just model requests, model all kinds of different thoughts, ideas, observations, and questions! The more you model, the more examples you'ree giving the communicator for what you consider valid ways of using their device.
boards_explainer: In %app_name% tá tacair stór focal comhdhéanta de bhailiúchán "clár". Tá roinnt cineálacha éagsúla clár ann ar féidir leat a roghnú, ag brath ar leibhéal feidhme agus riachtanais do chumarsáide. Nuair a aimsíonn tú ceann a thaitníonn leat, buail "Déan é seo mo Bhord Baile" chun é a dhéanamh mar "bord baile" an chumarsáideora, agus is é sin a fheicfidh an cumarsáidí gach uair a lódálann siad an aip den chéad uair. [[ In %app_name% vocabulary sets are made up of a collection of "boards". There are a number of different types of boards you can choose from, depending on the functional level and needs of your communicator. When you find one you like, hit "Make This My Home Board" to make it the communicator's "home board", which is what the communicator will see every time they first load the app.
easy_to_change_later: Neirbhíseach roghnóidh tú an bord mícheart? Ná bí buartha! Is féidir leat rudaí a athrú go héasca níos déanaí. [[ Nervous you'll pick the wrong board? Don't fret! You can easily change things later.
youre_all_set: Tá tú Socraithe go léir! [[ You're All Set!
done_setup: Go raibh maith agat as foghlaim! Más mian leat dul tríd an socrú seo arís, gheobhaidh tú nasc faoi "Extras" ar do dheais. [[ Thanks for learning! If you ever want to go through this setup again, you'll find a link under "Extras" on your dashboard.
continue_to_training: Más mian leat níos mó a fhoghlaim faoi conas %app_name% a úsáid, is féidir leat leanúint ar aghaidh lenár rang teagaisc, nó bíodh leisce ort triail a bhaint as rudaí leat féin. [[ If you'd like to learn a little more about how to use %app_name%, you can continue this our tutorial, or feel free to try things out on your own.
continue_tutorial: Leanúint ar aghaidh leis an Teagaisc [[ Continue the Tutorial
exiting_speak_mode: Ag éirí as Mód Labhairt [[ Exiting Speak Mode
exit_speak_mode_1: Is féidir leat éirí as Mód Labhair trí bhualadh ar an roghchlár úsáideora sa chúinne uachtarach ar dheis. Má tá imní ort faoi úsáideoir a fhágann Mód Speak de thaisme ina n-aonar, is féidir leat PIN a shocrú i sainroghanna an úsáideora. [[ You can exit out of Speak Mode by hitting the user menu in the top right corner. If you're worried about a user accidentally exiting Speak Mode on their own, you can set up a PIN in the user's preferences.
pin_for_exiting_speak_mode: Socraigh bioráin 4 dhigit go roghnach chun nach bhfágann tú Mód Speak: [[ Optionally set a 4-digit pin to prevent exiting Speak Mode:
usage_logging_and_reports: Logáil Úsáide agus Tuarascálacha [[ Usage Logging and Reports
logging_reports_1: Tá uirlisí tuairiscithe cumhachtacha ionsuite ag %app_name% a chuireann ar chumas cúramóirí, teiripeoirí agus lucht tacaíochta rudaí a fheiceáil mar an t-am den lá a bhfuil an gléas in úsáid, na focail is coitianta agus an dul chun cinn i dtreo spriocanna. Chun na gnéithe cabhrach seo a úsáid, níl le déanamh ach logáil a chumasú. [[ %app_name% has powerful built-in reporting tools that allow caregivers, therapists and supporters to see things like what time of day the device is being used, most common words and progress toward goals. To use these helpful features, just enable logging.
logging_is_enabled: Tá an logáil Cumasaithe [[ Logging is Enabled
a_little_about_core: Beagán Faoi Core [[ A Little About Core
core_1: Coincheap tábhachtach amháin le AAC ná focail “lárnacha”. Is focail iad croífhocail a úsáidimid go minic sa chumarsáid laethúil, agus is féidir le bríonna iolracha a bheith acu. Is féidir le croífhocail cabhrú le cumarsáidí atá ag fás foghlaim conas cumarsáid a dhéanamh i rith a lae, in ionad i gceann amháin nó dhá chás. [[ One important concept with AAC is "core" words. Core words are words we use often in everyday communication, and can have multiple meanings. Core words can help growing communicators learn to communicate throughout their day, instead of just in one or two situations.
core_2: Samhlaigh dá mbeadh gach a d'fhéadfá a rá frásaí réamhshainithe mar "Tá ocras orm", "Tá mé tuirseach", nó "Déanaimis é sin arís." Conas a chuirfeá ceist ar dhuine éigin faoina lá? Conas a déarfá nár thaitin rud éigin leat? In ionad a bheith ag iarraidh smaoineamh ar na frásaí go léir a d’fhéadfadh a bheith ag teastáil ó chumarsáidí, is féidir linn a mhúineadh chun a gcuid frásaí féin a thógáil ag baint úsáide as croífhocail. [[ Imagine if all you could say were predefined phrases like "I'm hungry", "I'm tired", or "Let's do that again." How would you ask someone about their day? How would you say you didn't like something? Instead of trying to think of all possible phrases a communicator might need, we can teach them to build their own phrases using core words.
core_3: Cuimhnigh ar phleanáil agus an deireadh i gcuimhne, agus aimsigh stór focal a bhfuil dóthain croífhocail ann chun go bhféadfaidh an cumarsáidí fás ann. [[ Remember to plan with the end in mind, and find a vocabulary set with enough core words for the communicator to grow into.
select_voice: Anois roghnaigh muid guth. Is é seo a chloisfidh daoine nuair a bhuaileann an cumarsáidí cnaipí. [[ Now let's pick a voice. This is what people will hear when the communicator hits buttons.
free_trial: Coinnigh i gcuimhne: tá tú fós sa triail saor in aisce, mar sin níl rochtain agat faoi láthair ach ar ghuthanna ionsuite an ghléis. Tar éis duit %app_name% a cheannach, is féidir leat ceann amháin de bhreis is 90 glór préimhe a íoslódáil. [[ Keep in mind: you're still in the free trial, so currently you only have access to the device's built-in voices. After you purchase %app_name%, you can download one of over 90 premium voices.
supporter_limited_voices: Tá cuntas %app_name% teoranta á úsáid agat, mar sin faoi láthair níl rochtain agat ach ar ghuthanna ionsuite an ghléis. Is féidir le cuntais chumarsáide íoctha guthanna préimhe a íoslódáil freisin le húsáid i Mód Speak. [[ You are using a limited %app_name% account, so currently you only have access to the device's built-in voices. Paid communicator accounts can also download premium voices for use in Speak Mode.
supporter_modeling_only: Tá cuntas %app_name% samhaltaithe amháin á úsáid agat, mar sin faoi láthair níl rochtain agat ach ar ghuthanna ionsuite an ghléis. Smaoinigh ar chuntas cumarsáide íoctha a cheannach má theastaíonn rochtain uait ar ghuthanna préimhe. [[ You are using a modeling-only %app_name% account, so currently you only have access to the device's built-in voices. Consider purchasing a paid communicator account if you need access to premium voices.
paid_voices: Cuimhnigh, is féidir leat na guthanna préimhe is féidir a íoslódáil chuig aipeanna soghluaiste agus Windows le haghaidh cuntais íoctha a bhrabhsáil freisin. [[ Remember, you can also browse the premium voices that can be downloaded to mobile and Windows apps for paid accounts.
listen_to_this_voice: Éist leis an nGuth Seo [[ Listen to This Voice
browse_premium_voices: Brabhsáil Guthanna Préimh [[ Browse Premium Voices
voice_as_fallback: Má tá sé beartaithe agat teachtaireachtaí a thaifeadadh, ní úsáidfear an guth seo ach amháin le haghaidh cnaipí ar bith nach bhfuil taifeadtaí ceangailte leo, nó le haghaidh focail atá litrithe de láimh ag baint úsáide as an méarchlár. [[ If you're planning to record messages, this voice will only be used for any buttons that don't have recordings attached to them, or for words that are manually spelled using the keyboard.
adding_supervisors: Maoirseoirí a Chur Leis [[ Adding Supervisors
supervisors_explainer: Is fearr a oibríonn %app_name% le foireann de lucht tacaíochta timpeall an chumarsáide. Is féidir le gach úsáideoir a gcuntas %app_name% féin a bheith aige (tá an lucht tacaíochta saor in aisce), agus is féidir le cumarsáidí baill foirne a nascadh lena gcuntas trína gcur leis mar "mhaoirseoirí". [[ %app_name% works best with a team of supporters around the communicator. Every user can have their own %app_name% account (supporters are free), and communicators can connect team members to their account by adding them as "supervisors".
get_added_as_supervisor: Chun na cláir agus na tuarascálacha do chumarsáidí a n-oibríonn tú leo a fheiceáil, ní mór do na húsáideoirí sin tú a chur leis óna deais. Is féidir leat iad a spreagadh chun gach duine a chur ar fud an chumarsáidí mar mhaoirseoirí chun cabhrú le foireann tacaíochta láidir a thógáil. Cuireann %app_name% cuntais samhaltaithe amháin saor in aisce ar fáil chun cabhrú le gach duine a bheith páirteach! [[ In order to see the boards and reports for communicators you work with, those users need to add you from their dashboard. You can encourage them to add everyone around the communicator as supervisors to help build a strong support team. %app_name% offers free modeling-only accounts to help everyone get involved!
add_lots_of_supervisors: Foghlaim AAC is fearr a oibríonn le go leor de lucht tacaíochta timpeall cumarsáide. Is féidir leat daoine cosúil le baill teaghlaigh, múinteoirí, teiripeoirí, etc. a spreagadh chun clárú le haghaidh cuntas tacaíochta saor in aisce, agus ansin iad a chur leis mar mhaoirseoirí chun rochtain a dheonú ar bhoird, tuarascálacha agus spriocanna. [[ Learning AAC works best with lots of supporters around communicator. You can encourage people like family members, teachers, therapists, etc. to sign up for a free supporter account, and then add them as supervisors to grant access to boards, reports and goals.
add_of_manage_supervisors: Maoirseoirí a chur leis nó a bhainistiú [[ Add or Manage Supervisors
accessing_linked_boards: Teacht ar Bhoird Nasctha [[ Accessing Linked Boards
folders_1: Is cnaipí nasctha iad cnaipí a bhfuil deilbhín fillteán beag nó marc sa chúinne acu, rud a chiallaíonn má roghnaíonn tú iad go dtógfaidh sé chuig bord eile tú. Ligeann sé seo duit leibhéil iolracha a bheith agat, le níos mó focal agus frásaí ná mar a d’fhéadfadh a bheith oiriúnach ar scáileán amháin. Is féidir leat filleadh ar an gcéad chlár i gcónaí ach an cnaipe baile a bhualadh. [[ Buttons that have a little folder icon or a mark in the corner are linked buttons, which means that if you select them it will take you to another board. This lets you have multiple levels, with more words and phrases than could fit on a single screen. You can always get back to the first board by hitting the home button.
folders_2: De réir réamhshocraithe ní labhraíonn cnaipí nasctha, agus nuair a bhuaileann an cumarsáidí cnaipe neamhnasctha tabharfar ar ais go dtí an clár baile iad, ach tá an dá shocrú seo roghnach agus is féidir iad a athrú i sainroghanna úsáideora. [[ By default linked buttons do not speak, and when the communicator hits a non-linked button they will be taken back to the home board, but both of these settings are optional and can be changed in a user's preferences.
speak_on_select: Labhair tar éis gach roghnú cnaipe [[ Speak after each button selection
speak_linked_buttons: Labhair fiú nuair a roghnaítear cnaipí nasctha [[ Speak even when linked buttons are selected
unlinked_auto_home_return: Fill abhaile nuair a roghnaítear cnaipí neamhnasctha [[ Return home when unlinked buttons are selected
access_selection: Conas a bheidh an cumarsáid seo ag roghnú cnaipí? [[ How will this communicator be selecting buttons?
touching_or_clicking: Ag baint nó ag cliceáil [[ Touching or Clicking
switch_access: Scanadh ag Úsáid Lasc [[ Scanning Using a Switch
dwell_tracking: Rianú Súile nó Cónaithe [[ Eye or Dwell Tracking
access_selection_action: Cad a tharlaíonn nuair a roghnaíonn an cumarsáidí cnaipe? [[ What happens when the communicator selects a button?
home_return_1: Nuair a roghnaítear cnaipe fillfidh %app_name% ar an gclár baile go huathoibríoch. Cuidíonn sé seo le seicheamh comhsheasmhach a fhorbairt do gach cnaipe (ar a dtugtar plean mótair), mar sin molaimid é mar an réamhshocrú ach is féidir leat é a athrú más gá. [[ When a button is selected %app_name% will automatically return to the home board. This helps develop a consistent sequence for each button (called a motor plan), so we recommend it as the default but you can change it if needed.
return_to_the_home_board: Fill ar Bhord an Tí [[ Return to the Home Board
stay_on_the_current_board: Fan ar an mBord Reatha [[ Stay on the Current Board
touch_access: rochtain tadhaill ar %app_name% [[ touch access to %app_name%
touch_1: Is é tadhall nó cliceáil cnaipí an modh rochtana is coitianta do chláir chumarsáide cosúil leis na cinn in CoughDrop. Trí chnaipe a chur ar chnaipí nó cliceáil orthu, is féidir le cumarsáidí nascleanúint a dhéanamh idir cláir agus focail nó frásaí a roghnú le go mbeidh an córas ag labhairt ar a son. [[ Touching or clicking buttons is the most common access method for communication boards like those in CoughDrop. By tapping or clicking on buttons, communicators can navigate between boards and select words or phrases to have the system speak for them.
touch_2: Tá socruithe breise de dhíth ar roinnt cumarsáideoirí, cosúil le roghnú bunaithe ar an áit a n-ardaíonn siad a méar, téacs níos mó, nó bearnaí níos mó idir cnaipí. Is féidir iad seo go léir a chumrú ó "Sainroghanna" úsáideora taobh istigh de CoughDrop. [[ Some communicators need additional accommodations, like selecting based on where they lift their finger, bigger text, or larger gaps between buttons. These are all configurable from a user's "Preferences" view inside of CoughDrop.
scanning_access: rochtain a scanadh in %app_name% [[ scanning access in %app_name%
scanning_1: Tá fadhbanna rialaithe mótair ag roinnt cumarsáidí a fhágann go mbíonn sé deacair dóibh cnaipí beaga a bhualadh ar scáileán. Más féidir leo spriocanna níos mó a bhualadh ar nós bluetooth nó cnaipe ceangailte ar a dtugtar “Athraigh”, nó fiú an scáileán a bhualadh, is féidir le %app_name% an clár a bhriseadh suas ina smután níos lú agus níos lú, “scan” tríothu ceann ag an am, agus fan. don úsáideoir a roghnú ag baint úsáide as a lasc. [[ Some communicators have motor control issues which make it hard for them to hit small buttons on a screen. If they can hit larger targets like a bluetooth or connected button called a "Switch", or even just hit the screen, then %app_name% can break the board up into smaller and smaller chunks, "scan" through them one at a time, and wait for the user to select using their switch.
scanning_2: Is féidir le %app_name% scanadh a dhéanamh de réir a chéile, colúin, nó réigiúin shaincheaptha, agus is féidir fiú guth nó toirt eile a úsáid le haghaidh scanadh chun rudaí a dhéanamh níos lú mearbhaill don chumarsáidí. Oibríonn sé le lasca seachtracha, nó is féidir leat an scáileán a dhéanamh ina chnaipe ollmhór, nó dhá chnaipe neamhspleácha. Tá na socruithe seo go léir ar fáil i radharc "Sainroghanna" úsáideora. [[ %app_name% can scan by row, column, or custom region, and can even use a different voice or volume for scanning to make things less confusing for the communicator. It works with external switches, or you can make the screen a giant button, or two independent buttons. All of these settings are available in a user's "Preferences" view.
dwell_access: áitigh rochtain in %app_name% [[ dwell access in %app_name%
dwell_1: Maidir le cumarsáidí gan rialú mótair comhsheasmhach, uaireanta is féidir le rianaithe súl a bheith ina modh rochtana éifeachtach. Is ceamara speisialta é rianaire súl a rianaíonn gluaiseachtaí súl. Nuair a fhanann cuma chumarsáide ar chnaipe ar feadh tréimhse ama, is féidir leis an gcóras an cnaipe sin a roghnú thar ceann an chumarsáidí. De rogha air sin, is féidir le córais áirithe gluaiseacht cloisteála nó coirp a rianú ag baint úsáide as ceamaraí nó braiteoirí chun an cúrsóir luiche a chóireáil mar luamhán stiúrtha, agus nuair a bhíonn an cúrsóir "ina chónaí" thar chnaipe, roghnaítear é. Is féidir le rianú súl nó áitribh a bheith níos tapúla ná rochtain lasc, ach tá sé níos deacra é a chalabrú i gceart. [[ For communicators without consistent motor control, eye trackers can sometimes be an effective access method. An eye tracker is a special camera that tracks eye movements. When a communicator's gaze lingers on a button for a period of time, the system can select that button on behalf of the communicator. Alternatively, some systems can track hear or body movement using cameras or sensors to treat the mouse cursor like a joystick, and when the cursor "dwells" over a button, it is selected. Eye or dwell tracking can be faster than switch access, but is more difficult to calibrate correctly.
dwell_2: Is féidir le %app_name% oibriú le haon rianaitheoir súl nó córas a thacaíonn le rialú cúrsóra (tá tástáil déanta againn ar Tobii, MyGaze, eyetech agus LC Technologies, agus crua-earraí EagleEyes). Níl le déanamh ach "cliceáil" a dhíchumasú ó láimhseálann %app_name% iad seo leis féin. Is féidir leat mionchoigeartú a dhéanamh ar na socruithe rianaithe ar amharc "Sainroghanna" an úsáideora. Beidh cumraíocht bhreise de dhíth ar roinnt córas, cosúil le EyeTribe agus EyeX, i "Sainroghanna" freisin. [[ %app_name% can work with any eye tracker or system that supports cursor control (we have tested Tobii, MyGaze, eyetech and LC Technologies, and EagleEyes hardware). Just disable "click" events since %app_name% handles these on its own. You can fine-tune the tracking settings on the user's "Preferences" view. Some systems, like EyeTribe and EyeX, will require additional configuration in "Preferences" as well.
modeling_1: Nuair a bhíonn duine ag foghlaim conas cumarsáid a dhéanamh (trí labhairt nó trí úsáid a bhaint as AAC), tá sé tábhachtach go mbeadh go leor cumarsáide tacaíochta acu ag cabhrú leo samplaí maithe a fheiceáil agus foghlaim i gceart. [[ When someone is learning to communicate (whether by speaking or using AAC), it's important that they have lots of supporting communicators helping them see good examples and learn correctly.
modeling_2: Sa domhan AAC tugann go leor daoine "samhaltú" air seo, agus tá sé tábhachtach go dtaispeánann daoine timpeall úsáideoirí AAC samplaí dóibh maidir le conas a n-úsáid éifeachtach a bhaint as a ngléas ("Ba mhaith leat fianán? Lig dom a thaispeáint duit, d'fhéadfá * ba mhaith leat * a rá agus ansin *fianán*"). [[ In the AAC world many people call this "modeling", and it's important that people around AAC users are showing them examples of how to effectively use their device ("You want a cookie? Let me show you, you could say *want* and then *cookie*").
modeling_3: In %app_name% má thapálann tú faoi thrí ar an gcnaipe soiléir, feicfidh tú deilbhín méar a léiríonn "Mód Samhaltú". Agus é sa Mhód Samhalta rianaíonn % app_name% cnaipí brúite mar ghníomhartha samhaltaithe ionas nach dtaispeánfar iad i dtuairiscí úsáide cumarsáide. Beartaíonn "Clear" arís chun Mód Samhaltú a fhágáil. [[ In %app_name% if you triple-tap the clear button, you'll see a finger icon indicating "Modeling Mode". When in Modeling Mode %app_name% tracks buttons pressed as modeling actions so they don't show up in a communicator's usage reports. Tap "Clear" again to leave Modeling Mode.
extra_reports_1: Is féidir le maoirseoirí athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar stair cumarsáide úsáideora freisin. Ar chúiseanna príobháideachta díchumasaítear logaí agus tuarascálacha de réir réamhshocraithe, ach má chumasaíonn tú iad is féidir le maoirseoirí an úsáideora a fheiceáil conas atá a gcumarsáid ag dul chun cinn le himeacht ama. [[ Supervisors can also review a user's communication history. For privacy reasons logs and reports are disabled by default, but if you enable them then the user's supervisors can see how their communication is progressing over time.
extra_reports_2: Áirítear i dtuairiscí faisnéis ar nós na focail is minice a úsáideann an cumarsáidí, cén t-am den lá a bhfuil an gléas in úsáid, agus fiú cá háit ar an scáileán a bhfuil siad ag bualadh. Is féidir leis an eolas seo cabhrú leis an bhfoireann fanacht i gcomhordú agus ar an tasc. [[ Reports include information like what words the communicator is using most often, what time of day the device is being used, and even where on the screen they're hitting. This information can help the team stay coordinated and on task.
extra_home_boards_1: Tá roinnt clár baile éagsúil ag %app_name% ar féidir leat tosú á n-úsáid láithreach, nó iad a chóipeáil agus a oiriúnú de réir mar a théann tú ar aghaidh. Tá cúpla cnaipí móra ag roinnt boird, agus tá go leor cnaipí beaga ag cuid acu. [[ %app_name% has a number of different home boards that you can start using right away, or copy and personalize as you go. Some boards have a few large buttons, and some have many small buttons.
extra_home_boards_2: Ciallaíonn níos mó cnaipí níos mó roghanna le haghaidh cur in iúl, ach tá roinnt úsáideoirí teoranta ó thaobh cé chomh beag agus is féidir le cnaipe a bhuail go hiontaofa (cuimhnigh gur féidir leat cnaipí a cheilt i gcónaí ar mhaith leat a chur leis níos déanaí, mar sin d'fhéadfadh bord a bhfuil cuma "róghnóthach" air. i ndáiríre rud ar féidir leo fás isteach ann le himeacht ama). [[ More buttons means more options for expression, but some users are limited in how small a button they can reliably hit (keep in mind you can always hide buttons for now that you want to add later, so a board that looks "too busy" may actually be something they can grow into over time).
intro_1: Go raibh maith agat as clárú le haghaidh %app_name%! Tá sceitimíní orainn go bhfuil tú anseo agus tá súil againn go ndéanfaidh %app_name% difríocht duit. Mura bhfuil %app_name% nua agat, cabhróidh an tsiúlóid seo leat tosú. [[ Thanks for signing up for %app_name%! We're excited you're here and hope %app_name% makes a difference for you. If you're new to %app_name%, this walkthrough will help you get started.
intro_3: Ar dtús, cuimhnigh ar d’ainm úsáideora (%{un}), is féidir leat é a úsáid chun logáil isteach agus an aip in aisce á íoslódáil agat. Is féidir leat freisin cláir a chur in eagar, tuarascálacha a chleachtadh agus a fheiceáil ó aon ríomhaire le brabhsálaí gréasáin! [[ First, remember your username (%{un}), you can use it to log in when you download the free app. You can also edit boards, practice and view reports from any computer with a web browser!
intro_2: Ansin ba mhaith linn gan ach beagán a mhúineadh faoi AAC (Cumarsáid Mhéadaithe agus Mhalartach), agus ansin cabhrú le cinntiú go bhfuil %app_name% socraithe agat i gceart. Buail "Ar Aghaidh" sa chúinne ag bun chun tús a chur leis. [[ Next we'd like to teach just a little about AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication), and then help make sure you've got %app_name% set up correctly. Hit "Next" in the bottom corner to get started.
skip_to_dashboard:
Scipeáil Chun Anois, Fill
go dtí an Deais [[ Skip For Now, Return
to the Dashboard
skip_to_board_choice:
Scipeáil Chun Anois, Just
Cabhraigh liom Bord a roghnú [[ Skip For Now, Just
Help Me Choose a Board
dashboard_1: Bogaimis ar aghaidh anois go dtí conas tosú ag úsáid %app_name%! [[ Now let's move on to how to get started using %app_name%!
dashboard_2: Nuair a logálann tú isteach ar %app_name% den chéad uair, tosóidh tú ar an deais. Anseo is féidir leat fógraí a fheiceáil, rochtain a fháil ar do phróifíl agus sainroghanna, agus brabhsáil trí na cláir bhaile atá ar fáil. [[ When you first log in to %app_name%, you'll start on the dashboard. Here you can see notifications, access your profile and preferences, and browse through the available home boards.
communicators_skip_dashboard: Feiceann cuntais maoirseoirí an deais i gcónaí nuair a logálann siad isteach den chéad uair, ach roghnaíonn cuntais chumarsáide an rogha chun an painéal a scipeáil agus dul díreach chuig an gclár baile nuair a bhíonn siad cumasaithe. [[ Supervisor accounts always see the dashboard when they first log in, but communicator accounts to opt to skip the dashboard and go straight to the home board when enabled.
logs_and_notes: Logchomhaid agus Nótaí [[ Logs and Notes
logs_1: Chomh maith le stair úsáide a athbhreithniú, is féidir le maoirseoirí rochtain a fháil ar thuairiscí mionsonraithe ar gach seisiún cumarsáide, agus is féidir leo nótaí a dhéanamh agus a roinnt le foireann an úsáideora, ionas go mbeidh a fhios ag gach duine cad é an straitéis reatha agus cad atá nó nach bhfuil ag obair go maith. [[ In addition to reviewing usage history, supervisors can access detailed reports on each communication session, and can make and share notes with the user's team, so everyone knows what the current strategy is and what is or isn't working well.
start_deciding: Chomh maith le bord a roghnú, tá roinnt socruithe eile ann ar féidir iad a athrú bunaithe ar chás an chumarsáidí. Coinnigh i gcuimhne gur féidir leat na socruithe seo a athrú i gcónaí níos déanaí faoi "Sainroghanna". [[ In addition to selecting a board, there are some other settings that can change based on the communicator's situation. Keep in mind that you can always change these settings later under "Preferences".
text_placement: Conas is mian leat cnaipí a thaispeáint? [[ How do you want buttons to appear?
text_above_pictures: Pictiúir le téacs thuas [[ Pictures with text above
no_pictures: Téacs amháin (gan pictiúir) [[ Text only (no pictures)
text_below_pictures: Pictiúir le téacs thíos [[ Pictures with text below
text_above_suggestion: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte, is rogha mhaith é an téacs thuas chun tosú le pictiúir ach chun focail a léamh thar am. [[ If you're not sure, having text above is a good option for starting with pictures but learning to read words over time.
symbol_background_question: Conas is mian leat pictiúir a thaispeáint? [[ How do you want pictures to display?
clear_background: Le cúlra a mheaitseálann an cnaipe [[ With a background matching the button
always_white_background: I gcónaí le cúlra bán [[ Always with a white background
always_black_background: I gcónaí le cúlra dubh [[ Always with a black background
high_contrast_black_background: Codarsnacht ard le cúlra dubh [[ High contrast with a black background
background_suggestion: I gcás fhormhór na n-úsáideoirí, oibríonn meaitseáil dath an chnaipe go maith, ach i gcás roinnt cumarsáide is féidir le cúlra bán cuidiú le codarsnacht agus le haitheantas. [[ For most users, matching the button color works well, but for some communicators having a white background can help with contrast and recognition.
which_symbols: Cé na siombailí is fearr leat? [[ Which symbols do you prefer?
use_original_symbols: Bain úsáid as siombailí bunaidh an bhoird [[ Use the board's original symbols
opensymbols: Opensymbols.org leabharlanna siombailí saor in aisce [[ Opensymbols.org free symbol libraries
lessonpix_library: Leabharlann siombailí LessonPix [[ LessonPix symbol library
pcs: Siombailí PCS le Tobii Dynavox [[ PCS Symbols by Tobii Dynavox
show_more_libraries: Taispeáin níos mó leabharlann [[ Show more libraries
twemoji: Deilbhíní Emoji (údar Twitter) [[ Emoji icons (authored by Twitter)
noun_project: Imlíníonn dubh The Noun Project [[ The Noun Project black outlines
arasaac: Siombailí ARASAAC saor in aisce, [[ ARASAAC free symbols
tawasol: Leabharlann siombailí Tawasol [[ Tawasol symbol library
premium_upgrade_required: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Beidh ort an t-uasghrádú siombailí préimhe a cheannach ar do leathanach billeála sular féidir leat na siombailí seo a úsáid. [[ NOTE: You will need to purchase the premium symbols upgrade on your billing page before you can use these symbols.
lessonpix_upgrade_required: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Beidh ort do chuntas LessonPix a nascadh le do chuntas %app_name% ar do leathanach Próifíl sular féidir leat na siombailí seo a úsáid. [[ NOTE: You will need to connect your LessonPix account to your %app_name% account on your Profile page before you can use these symbols.
symbols_suggestion: Tá leabharlann siombailí ar eolas ag roinnt cumarsáide cheana féin nó is féidir leo leas a bhaint as stíl áirithe, agus is féidir %app_name% a shocrú chun úsáid a bhfuil siad eolach air. Is breá freisin úsáid a bhaint as siombailí bunaidh an bhoird. [[ Some communicators already know a symbol library or can benefit from a certain style, and %app_name% can be set to use they're familiar with. Using the board's original symbols is also fine.
symbol_skin_question: Cén ton craicinn ar mhaith leat a fheiceáil ar phictiúir atá bunaithe ar dhaoine? [[ What skin tone(s) would you like to see on people-based pictures?
utterance_layout: Conas is mian leat focail a fheiceáil le chéile? [[ How do you want to see words combined?
show_words: Taispeáin téacs focal i gcomhabairtí [[ Show word text in combined sentences
show_symbols: Taispeáin gach cnaipe le siombailí [[ Show each button with symbols
utterance_suggestion: Is féidir le téacs amháin cabhrú le cumarsáidí foghlaim conas a chomhcheanglaíonn focail le habairtí agus cuidiú le litearthacht a chur chun cinn mar go bhfeiceann siad an bhéim ar fhocail, ach b’fhéidir nach bhfuil sé oiriúnach do gach úsáideoir. [[ Text-only can help communicators learn how words combine into sentences and help promote literacy as they see the emphasis on words, but it may not be the best fit for all users.
speak_mode_1: Nuair a bheidh bord baile roghnaithe agat is féidir leat é a rochtain ach é a sheoladh isteach i Mód Speak. [[ Once you've selected a home board you can access it by launching into Speak Mode.
extra_speak_mode_2: Nuair a bhíonn tú i Mód Labhairt is féidir leat cnaipí a bhualadh chun iad a labhairt, agus iad a chur leis an mbosca gutha ag an mbarr. Má bhuaileann tú an bosca gutha labhróidh sé na cnaipí go léir atá suite ann. Is féidir leis an gcúlspás agus na cnaipí soiléire cuidiú leis an bhfuinneog abairte a choinneáil glan. [[ When you're in Speak Mode you can hit buttons to have them spoken, and added to the vocalization box at the top. If you hit the vocalization box it'll speak all the buttons that are located there. The backspace and clear buttons can help keep the sentence window clean.

discounts_for: Fuascailtí Lascaine le haghaidh [[ Discount Redemptions for

multi_code_intro2: curtha ar bun le cód bronntanais iolracha le húsáid laistigh de %app_name%. Is féidir leat na cóid bronntanais seo a dháileadh ar úsáideoirí atá in ann iad a chur isteach nuair a chláraíonn siad chun rochtain saor in aisce a fháil ar ghnéithe cumarsáide %app_name%. cloud_extras_gift_duration: agus folaíonn cód %{dur} de rochtain saor in aisce ar ghnéithe néalríomhaireachta %app_name%. [[ and code includes %{dur} of free access to %app_name%'s cloud extras features.

bulk_purchase_intro: Go raibh maith agat as do spéis i %app_name% a cheannach! Is uirlis chumhachtach é %app_name% chun cumarsáidí agus an fhoireann tacaíochta timpeall orthu a fhorbairt. Táimid muiníneach gur féidir le %app_name% difríocht a dhéanamh do na cumarsáidí lena n-oibríonn tú. Cuir isteach an t-eolas seo a leanas chun do cheannachán a chríochnú. Má tá aon cheist agat, ná bíodh drogall ort teagmháil a dhéanamh lenár bhfoireann tacaíochta. We are confident that %app_name% can make a difference for the communicators you work with. Please enter the following information to complete your purchase. stash_explanation_1: Úsáideann an duine seo bogearraí a ritheann ar thaibléad, guthán nó ríomhaire chun cabhrú leo cumarsáid a dhéanamh. Úsáideann daoine [[ This person uses software running on a tablet, phone or computer to help them communicate. People use
aac: Cumarsáid Mhéadaithe agus Mhalartach [[ Augmentative and Alternative Communication
stash_explanation_2: ar go leor cúiseanna éagsúla. Níl sé chomh difriúil sin ó mhéarchlár a úsáid chun teachtaireachtaí a scríobh ar líne, ach amháin go gcaithfidh daoine áirithe fiú a bhfuil siad ag iarraidh a rá os ard a chlóscríobh. Má úsáidtear pictiúir chun focail agus smaointe a aithint is féidir é a dhéanamh níos éasca uaireanta teacht ar na focail chearta le rá. [[ for many different reasons. It's really not that different from using a keyboard to write messages online, except some people have to type even what they want to say out loud. Using pictures to help identify words and ideas can sometimes make it easier to find the right words to say.

importing_recordings_please_wait: Ag iompórtáil taifeadtaí, seans go dtógfaidh sé seo cúpla nóiméad... [[ Importing recordings, this could take a few minutes...
check_logging_with_user_first: Cinntigh, le do thoil, go dtuigeann an cumarsáidí cén fáth a bhfuil tú ag logáil a gcumarsáide, agus faigh a gcead sula dtéann tú ar aghaidh. [[ Please make sure the communicator understands why you are logging their communication, and get their permission before proceeding.
logging_1: Nuair a chumasaíonn tú logáil, bailítear faisnéis lena n-áirítear cnaipí brúite, am den lá, tréithe crua-earraí amhail méid an scáileáin agus treoshuíomh agus stóráiltear iad sa scamall ar do shon. Úsáideann cuid de na tuarascálacha seo Google Charts chun faisnéis anaithnid a sholáthar, amhail cnaipí a bhrúitear in aghaidh an lae agus codanna de mhinicíocht cainte de réir cineáil. Úsáidtear na sonraí seo chun tuarascálacha a ghiniúint chun cabhrú leis an bhfoireann tacaíochta dul chun cinn a rianú agus spriocanna éifeachtacha a leagan síos, agus is féidir iad a dhíchumasú am ar bith. [[ When you enable logging, information including buttons pressed, time of day, hardware characteristics like screen size and orientation are all collected and stored in the cloud on your behalf. Some of these reports use Google Charts to render anonymized information like buttons pressed per day and parts of speech frequency by type. This data is used to generate reports to help the support team track progress and set effective goals, and can be disabled at any time.
logging_2: Chun cabhrú le tacú le taighde in AAC, úsáideann %app_name% achoimrí anaithnide ar an bhfaisnéis úsáide logáilte go léir chun treochtaí ginearálta a roinnt leis an bpobal. Áiríonn sé seo sonraí achoimre ar nós focail chroí coitianta, am seisiúin iomlán agus minicíocht tipiciúil samhaltú. Comhoibríonn %app_name% freisin le heagraíochtaí taighde trí fhaisnéis chumarsáide anaithnid a sholáthar ó %app_name% úsáideoirí a bhfuil tacaíocht taighde anaithnid cumasaithe acu. Ní roinntear próifílí úsáideora agus faisnéis inaitheanta, ach d'fhéadfadh na sonraí gan ainm a bheith foilsithe go poiblí, agus mura bhfuil tú compordach ag roinnt cumarsáid AAC an úsáideora seo le taighdeoirí poiblí, is féidir leat rogha an diúltaithe anseo nó ar an úsáideoir leathanach sainroghanna. Tabhair faoi deara nach scriosfar úsáideoirí neamhghníomhacha a roghnaigh isteach ónár gcóras ar feadh tréimhse níos faide, chun leanúint ar aghaidh ag tabhairt tacaíochta do thaighdeoirí. [[ To help support research in AAC, %app_name% uses anonymized summaries of all logged usage information to share general trends with the community. This includes summary data like popular core words, total session time and typical frequency of modeling. %app_name% also collaborates with research organizations by providing anonymized communication information from %app_name% users who have enabled anonymous research support. User profiles and identifiable information are not shared, but the anonymized data may be published publicly, and if you're not comfortable sharing this user's AAC communication with public researchers, you can opt out here or on the user's preferences page. Note that inactive users who have opted in will not be deleted from our system for an extended period of time, to continue to provide support to researchers.
allow_research: Roinn sonraí úsáide gan ainm le taighdeoirí agus i dtuarascálacha achoimre pobail [[ Share anonymized usage data with researchers and in community summary reports
logging_3: Ina theannta sin, más mian leat, is féidir le %app_name% sonraí GPS a rianú chun léargais níos fearr a sholáthar ar an gcaoi a n-athraíonn cumarsáid úsáideora bunaithe ar shuíomh. Is féidir na sonraí logála go léir a ghlanadh de láimh ón gcóras ó leathanach Roghanna úsáideora. Más mian leat díliostáil ó bhailiú sonraí comhiomlán nó % app_name% riarthóirí a dhíchumasú ó do logaí a fheiceáil agus fabhtcheartaithe is féidir leat "Srian go hiomlán Rochtain Logchomhaid" a roghnú ar Roghanna an úsáideora [[ Additionally, if you'd like, %app_name% can track GPS data to provide better insights into how user communication changes based on location. All logging data can be manually cleared from the system from a user's Preferences page. If you would like to opt-out of aggregate data collection or disable %app_name% administrators from seeing your logs while troubleshooting you can choose "Completely Restrict Log Access" on the user's Preferences

[[ NOTE: You should also change the password on the account for each new eval, otherwise previous trial users would be able to log in and see content and logs for the current trial user.
new_email: Seoladh Ríomhphoist Nua [[ New Email Address
must_be_different_email: Ní mór seoladh ríomhphoist eile a bheith ann ná an uair dheireanach [[ Must be a different email address than last time
reset_not_allowed: Níl cead agat an luacháil seo a athshocrú [[ You don't have permission to reset this evaluation
how_to_transfer: Nuair a bheidh tú réidh le %app_name% a úsáid go fadtéarmach, beidh sé ciall duit do chláir agus do logaí a aistriú amach as an gcuntas meastóireachta seo agus isteach i gcuntas nua buan. Chun seo a dhéanamh, cláraigh le haghaidh cuntas trialach saor in aisce agus cuir isteach an fhaisnéis logáil isteach don chuntas nua sin thíos. Aistreofar na cláir agus na logaí a cruthaíodh le linn na meastóireachta chuig an gcuntas nua. [[ Once you are ready to use %app_name% long-term, it will make sense to transfer your boards and logs out of this evaluation account and into a new, permanent account. To do this, sign up for a free trial account and the enter the login information for that new account below. The boards and logs created during the evaluation will all be transferred to the new account.

Cuir isteach dáta éaga nua agus nuashonrófar an cuntas meastóireachta an chéad uair eile a shioncronaítear é. [[ You can extend an existing evaluation as needed for the current communicator. Please enter a new expiration date and the evaluation account will update the next time it syncs.
one_week_extension_or_talk_to_supervisor: Is féidir leat seachtain bhreise a shíneadh má theastaíonn beagán níos mó ama uait, ach ní bheidh tú in ann an mheastóireacht a leathnú ach uair amháin. Ina dhiaidh sin beidh ort labhairt leis an ngrúpa a thug an cuntas seo duit faoi do mheastóireacht a shíneadh níos faide. [[ You can extend an extra week if you need a little more time, but you will only be able to extend the evaluation once. After that you'll need to talk to the group who gave you this account about extending your evaluation longer.
eval_expired_for_user: Chuaigh an tréimhse mheastóireachta do %{user_name} in éag [[ The evaluation period for %{user_name} expired

reset_or_extend: Is féidir leat an tréimhse mheastóireachta reatha a athshocrú nó a shíneadh, nó an cuntas a ghlanadh chun meastóireacht nua a thosú. [[ You can reset or extend the current evaluation period, or wipe the account clean to start a new evaluation.
extend_or_transfer: Is féidir leat síneadh a chur le seachtain bhreise má tá beagán ama breise uait nó chun ábhar a aistriú chuig cuntas eile. [[ You can extend an extra week if you need a little extra time or to transfer content to a different account.
can_transfer_content: Má tá cláir agus logaí ar mhaith leat a chaomhnú ón meastóireacht seo, is féidir leat an t-ábhar meastóireachta ar fad a aistriú chuig cuntas %app_name% eile freisin. [[ If there are boards and logs you would like to preserve from this evaluation, you can also transfer all evaluation content to a different %app_name% account.
not_eval_account: Ní cuntas meastóireachta é seo. [[ This is not an evaluation account.
transfer_complete_logging_out: Aistriú Críochnaithe! Logáil Amach... [[ Transfer Complete! Logging Out...
extension_failed: Theip ar an Síneadh [[ Extension Failed
cant_extend_evaluation: Ní féidir an Measúnú a Shíneadh [[ Can't Extend Evaluation

done_board_intro: Sin é! Más mian leat dul tríd an intro seo arís, níl le déanamh ach bualadh ar an roghchlár sa chúinne uachtarach ar dheis agus roghnaigh "Board Intro" [[ That's it! If you want to go through this intro again, just hit the menu in the top right corner and choose "Board Intro"

Má tá athruithe déanta agat ar do chláir ó ghléas eile is féidir go ndéanfar d’athruithe a fhorscríobh. [[ Are you sure you want to push your %{cnt} local boards to the cloud? If you have made changes to your boards from a different device then your changed may be overwritten.
pushing_to_cloud: Ag brú go dtí an Scamall... [[ Pushing to Cloud...
error_pushing_to_cloud: Earráid á Bhrú go Scamall [[ Error Pushing to Cloud
one_or_more_boards_failed_to_push: Níor éirigh le boird amháin nó níos mó a bhrú go dtí an scamall [[ One or more boards were not successfully pushed to the cloud
log_entry: Iontráil Lámhleabhar Gníomhaíochta Úsáideora [[ User Activity Manual Entry
external_device_enter_log_explainer: Maidir le cumarsáidí a úsáideann feiste nó aip tríú páirtí, is féidir leat logaí a chur isteach de láimh don úsáideoir sin chun go mbeidh feidhm ag gnéithe tuairiscithe agus rianaithe sprice %app_name%. Chun é sin a dhéanamh, ní gá ach na focail nó na frásaí a d'úsáid an cumarsáidí a chur isteach, agus brúigh "cnaipe" amháin in aghaidh an líne. [[ For communicators using a third-party device or app, you can manually enter logs for that user to allow for %app_name%'s reporting and goal tracking features to take effect. To do so, just enter the words or phrases the communicator used, with one "button" press per line.
enter_log_explainer: Aistríonn roinnt cumarsáidí idir córais chumarsáide dhigiteacha agus chlóite, rud a chiallaíonn go mb'fhéidir gur mhaith leat seisiúin chumarsáide a chur isteach de láimh chun gach rud a choinneáil cothrom le dáta. Chun é sin a dhéanamh, ní gá ach na focail nó na frásaí a d'úsáid an cumarsáidí a chur isteach, agus brúigh "cnaipe" amháin in aghaidh an líne. [[ Some communicators switch between digital and printed communication systems, which means that you may want to manually enter communication sessions to keep everything up-to-date. To do so, just enter the words or phrases the communicator used, with one "button" press per line.
paint_levels_explainer: Is féidir leibhéil forbartha ionsuite a bheith ag cláir %app_name%, ionas gur féidir leat bunrang a thosú agus stór focal agus acmhainní a chur leis de réir a chéile de réir mar a fhorbraíonn an cumarsáid. Is féidir leat an uirlis péinteála a úsáid chun leibhéil fáis a shainiú níos éasca trí chnaipí iolracha a nuashonrú ag an am céanna. [[ %app_name% boards can have levels of development built-in, so you can start basic and gradually add vocabulary and resources as the communicator develops. You can use the paint tool to make defining growth levels easier by updating multiple buttons at the same time.
levels_are_suggestions: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Is moladh roghnach iad na tuairiscí leibhéil, b'fhéidir gur mhaith leat do leibhéil féin a shainiú bunaithe ar an spriocghrúpa a bhfuil tú ag obair leis. Go ginearálta is fearr na meánleibhéil a scipeáil agus ar a laghad Leibhéal 1 agus Leibhéal 10 a úsáid mar phointí dul chun cinn. [[ NOTE: The level descriptions are an optional suggestion, you may want to define your own levels based on the target audience you are working with. In general it is better to skip middle levels and at least use Level 1 and Level 10 as progression points.
update_at_level: Nuashonrú Ag Leibhéal [[ Update At Level
communication_profiles_for: Próifílí Cumarsáide le haghaidh %{un} [[ Communication Profiles for %{un}
loading_profile_details: Sonraí próifíle á lódáil... [[ Loading profile details...
error_loading_profile_details: Earráid agus sonraí próifíle á lódáil [[ Error loading profile details
no_data_for_profile_type: Níor taifeadadh aon sonraí don chineál próifíle seo [[ No data recorded for this profile type
see_other_profile_results: Féach ar thorthaí próifíle eile [[ See other profile results
loading_profile_data: Sonraí próifíle á lódáil... [[ Loading profile data...
error_loading_profile_data: Earráid agus sonraí próifíle á lódáil [[ Error loading profile data
profiles_explainer: Is uirlisí meastóireachta iad Próifílí Cumarsáide is féidir a úsáid chun measúnú nó monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar fhorbairt cumarsáide úsáideora. Is féidir le próifílí díriú ar chumarsáidí nó ar na daoine a oibríonn leo, agus is féidir iad a rith go minic. Is féidir leo cabhrú le cinneadh a dhéanamh ar spriocanna oiriúnacha don úsáideoir agus cabhrú le foirne comhordú a dhéanamh ar straitéisí éifeachtacha tacaíochta. [[ Communication Profiles are evaluation tools that can be used to assess or monitor a user's communication development. Profiles can target communicators or the people who work with them, and can be run multiple times. They can help with deciding on appropriate goals for a user and can help teams coordinate on effective strategies for support.
profiles_explainer_2: TABHAIR FAOI DEARA: Ba cheart próifílí a reáchtáil i gcónaí le rannpháirtíocht an úsáideora, fiú amháin más rud é go bhféadfadh a rannpháirtíocht a bheith teoranta. Chomh maith leis sin, níor cheart riamh próifílí a úsáid mar “cruthúnas” nár cheart go bhfaigheadh duine tacaíochtaí iomlána cumarsáide nó eispéiris foghlama aois-oiriúnach. chances_to_use_word: Is féidir leat cabhrú le do chumarsáidí a gcuid focal a úsáid trína thaispeáint! Cuardaigh deiseanna chun an focal "%{word}" a úsáid i ngníomhaíochtaí agus i socruithe éagsúla le go n-éireoidh siad níos compordaí leis an bhfocal. target_words_explainer: Moladh gach ceann de na focail seo a leanas bunaithe ar ghníomhaíocht úsáideora atá ar fáil, spriocanna, am san aip, srl. modeling_ideas_intro_1: An raibh a fhios agat go bhfoghlaimíonn cumarsáidí nua focail a chur le chéile trí bhreathnú ar dhaoine eile é a dhéanamh ar dtús? An raibh a fhios agat go gcloisfidh leanaí na mílte uair an chloig de chaint labhartha sula labhraítear leo ina n-aonar? Nó go molann saineolaithe AAC suas le 80% den chumarsáid le húsáideoir nua a bheith múnlaithe ar fheiste? [[ Did you know that new communicators learn to combine words by observing others do it first? Did you know that babies hear thousands of hours of spoken language before speaking on their own? Or that AAC experts recommend up to 80% of communication with a new user be modeled on a device?
modeling_ideas_intro_2: Tá sé an-tábhachtach samhaltú, nó samplaí de conas cnaipí a bhualadh chun cumarsáid a dhéanamh! Agus tú ag tosú ag obair le cumarsáidí atá ag baint úsáide as AAC, lorg seansanna focail éagsúla, nó na focail chéanna a shamhaltú ar bhealaí éagsúla. B’fhéidir go dtógfaidh sé cleachtadh le bheith compordach nó le torthaí a fheiceáil, ach tá léirithe ag taighde arís agus arís eile cé chomh mór is atá samhaltú difriúil! [[ Modeling, or showing examples of how to hit buttons to communicate, is very important! As you start work with communicators who are using AAC, look for chances to model different words, or the same words in different ways. It may take practice to get comfortable or to see results, but research has shown over and over how much of a different modeling makes!
modeling_intro_3: Uirlis %app_name% is ea Smaointe sa Mhúnlú a mholann roinnt gníomhaíochtaí gach lá bunaithe ar spriocfhocail ó spriocanna agus stair logála d’úsáideoirí. Tá súil againn go gcuideoidh sé go leor smaointe a thabhairt duit chun cabhrú le do chumarsáidí fás! [[ Modeling Ideas is a %app_name% tool that recommends a few activities every day based on target words from your user's goals and log history. We hope it helps give you lots of ideas to help your communicator grow!

focus_words_explainer: Is uirlis é Focail Fócais chun rochtain níos éasca a thabhairt ar an bhfo-thacar focal a bhaineann le topaic nó gníomhaíocht ar leith. In áit cóip den stór focal comhthéacs-shonrach a chruthú, ligeann Focail Fócais do chumarsáidí agus do lucht tacaíochta suíomh na bhfocal ábhartha i stór focal réamhshocraithe an chumarsáide a fhoghlaim. [[ Focus Words is a tool for prividing easier access to the subset of words that have to do with a specific topic or activity. Rather than creating a separate context-specific copy of the vocabulary, Focus Words allows communicators and supporters to learn the location of relevant words in the communicator's default vocabulary.
focus_words_explainer2: Is féidir leat Focail Fócais a úsáid trí théacs leabhar léitheoireachta comhroinnte a chur isteach, focail a bhaineann le gníomhaíocht ar leith, srl. Is féidir leat bailiúchán an phobail de thacair Focal Fócais a bhrabhsáil freisin nó do chuid féin a shábháil le haghaidh rochtana tapa. [[ You can use Focus Words by entering the text of a shared reading book, words related to a specific activity, etc. You can also browse the community's collection of Focus Word sets or save your own for quick access.

badges_explainer: Bhí suaitheantas amháin nó níos mó tuillte ag an gcumadóir seo! Socraítear roinnt suaitheantais go huathoibríoch in %app_name%, ach is féidir leat do spriocanna féin a shocrú go héasca agus suaitheantais nua a shannadh chun dul leo. [[ This communicator had earned one or more badges! Some badges are automatically set up in %app_name%, but you can also easily set your own goals and assign new badges to go with them.
goals_explainer: Cuid thábhachtach den phróiseas cumarsáide is ea spriocanna a shocrú! In %app_name%, is féidir le spriocanna cabhrú leis an bhfoireann a choinneáil ar an leathanach céanna agus oibriú ar an rud céanna, rud atá tábhachtach do chumarsáideoirí atá ag forbairt le déanaí. [[ Setting goals is an important part of the communication process! In %app_name%, goals can help keep the team on the same page and working on the same thing, which is important for newly-developing communicators.
goals_explainer_12: Má fhágann tú Mód Speak agus má théann tú chuig an rannán ‘Spriocanna’ de do chuntas is féidir leat sprioc atá ann cheana féin a aimsiú nó ceann de do chuid féin a shocrú. Is féidir leat fiú an córas a rianú go huathoibríoch dul chun cinn i dtreo na sprice, agus suaitheantais a bhronnadh ar an cumarsáide mar a théann siad ar aghaidh! [[ If you exit Speak Mode and go to the 'Goals' section of your account you can find an existing goal or set one of your own. You can even have the system automatically track progress toward the goal, and award badges to the communicator as they progress!
goals_explainer_2: Chun do chéad sprioc a shocrú, buail an cnaipe 'Sprioc Nua' thíos agus cuir tús leis. Is féidir leat sprioc atá ann cheana féin a aimsiú nó ceann de do chuid féin a shocrú. Is féidir leat fiú an córas a rianú go huathoibríoch dul chun cinn i dtreo na sprice, agus suaitheantais a bhronnadh ar an cumarsáide mar a théann siad ar aghaidh! [[ To set your first goal, hit the 'New Goal' button below and get started. You can find an existing goal or set one of your own. You can even have the system automatically track progress toward the goal, and award badges to the communicator as they progress!

see_user_goals_and_badges: Spriocanna agus Suaitheantais [[ Goals and Badges

no_tools_available: Níl aon uirlisí ar fáil [[ No tools available
error_installing_tool: Earráid Suiteáil Uirlis [[ Error Installing Tool
please_check_settings: Cinntigh go bhfuil na socruithe cearta curtha isteach agat [[ Please check that you have entered the correct settings
credentials_already_in_use: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go bhfuil na socruithe sin á n-úsáid cheana féin ag úsáideoir %app_name% eile [[ It looks like those settings are already being used by a different %app_name% user
bad_webhook_url: Is cosúil nach bhfuil an URL a d'iontráil tú ag teacht leis an luach atá riachtanach don chomhtháthú seo [[ The URL you entered doesn't seem to match the value needed for this integration
some_hard_to_hear: Is deacair éisteacht le roinnt daoine [[ Some people are hard to hear
want_to_fix_that: - gan aon locht orthu féin. Teastaíonn cúnamh teicneolaíochta ó go leor daoine le go n-éistfear lena nglór. Ar an drochuair, tá go leor den teicneolaíocht sin deacair a úsáid, tá sé deacair a chumrú, agus tá sé costasach ar mire. Is aip nua AAC é %app_name% a dhéanann iarracht é sin a shocrú. [[ -- through no fault of their own. Many people need the assistance of technology in order for their voices to be heard. Unfortunately, a lot of that technology is hard to use, is hard to configure, and is crazy expensive. %app_name% is a new AAC app that tries to fix that.
why_cough_drop: Cén fáth "%app_name%"? Cuidíonn titeann casacht leat an guth a bhí agat cheana féin a fháil ar ais, ach b’fhéidir nach raibh daoine in ann éisteacht chomh maith sin. Tá siad saor agus ní bhíonn aon duine aisteach ort nuair a úsáideann tú iad. Is mian linn cabhrú leis an AAC a bhaint amach go dtí an pointe céanna sin trí réitigh shimplí inacmhainne, sochaideartha a sholáthar ar riachtanais chasta chumarsáide a oibríonn le húsáid laethúil. [[ Why "%app_name%"? Cough drops help you get back the voice you already had, but that maybe people couldn't hear so well. They're cheap and nobody looks at you weird when you use them. We want to help get AAC to that same point by providing affordable, approachable, simple solutions to complex communication needs that work for everyday use.
learn_as_you_go: Foghlaim mar a Théann Tú [[ Learn as You Go
learn_as_you_go_content_1: Mura bhfuil tú nua i saol na cumarsáide méadaithe, mothaíonn beagnach gach cuid di imeaglaithe. Cén chaoi a mbeadh a fhios agat, b’fhéidir, na focail agus na siombailí cearta le roghnú do riachtanais phearsanta (agus mianta, agus dóchas agus mianta) an duine. Gan a bheith buartha, oibrímid le go leor speisialtóirí éagsúla chun teimpléid dea-thaighde a chur ar fáil a chuirfidh tús leat. Agus chomh tábhachtach céanna, cuirimid acmhainní oiliúna ar fáil do thuismitheoirí, cúramóirí, siblíní... tá a fhios ag gach duine a bhfuil baint aige le tacú le duine cad atá ar siúl agus conas go díreach is féidir leo cabhrú leis na straitéisí cumarsáide a bheith rathúil. [[ If you're new to the world of augmentative communication, just about every part of it feels intimidating. How could you possibly know the right words and symbols to pick for an individual's personal needs (and wants, and hopes, and wishes). Not to worry, we work with many different specialists to provide well-researched templates that will get you started. And just as importantly, we provide training resources for parents, caregivers, siblings... everyone involved in supporting an individual deserves to know what's going on and how exactly they can help the communication strategies be successful.
offline_content_1: Is iontach an rud é sonraí a bhailiú agus oibriú trasna gléasanna, ach tá neart áiteanna fós ann nach mbeidh nasc maith Wi-Fi agat. Stórálann %app_name% cláir agus logaí úsáideora ar gach gléas ionas gur féidir leis an úsáideoir cumarsáid a dhéanamh as líne gan aon bhriseadh. Sioncrónaíonn gach rud cúltaca an chéad uair eile a bhíonn nasc idirlín ann. [[ Gathering data and working across devices is great, but there are still plenty of places where you won't have a good Wi-fi connection. %app_name% stores a user's boards and logs on each device so the user can communicate offline with no interrupts. Everything syncs back up the next time there is an internet connection.
personalization: Pearsanú agus Sioncronú [[ Personalization and Sync
personalization_content_1: Tá sé contúirteach a bheith ceangailte le gléas amháin, go háirithe nuair atá go leor de do chuid pictiúr féin curtha leis agat nó nuair a bhog tú siombailí pictiúir timpeall le haghaidh úsáide pearsanta. Ní hamháin gur féidir leat do shonraí agus do chumraíocht a chailleadh, ach má scoilteann scáileán nó ceallra bás, níl an t-ádh leat go dtí gur féidir é a athsholáthar. Oibríonn %app_name% thar ghléasanna iolracha agus coinníonn sé an t-inneachar i sioncronú duit ionas nach gá duit a bheith buartha. [[ Being tied to a single device is risky, especially when you've added lots of your own pictures or moved picture symbols around for personal use. Not only can you possibly lose your data and configuration, but if a screen cracks or a battery dies, you're out of luck until it can be replaced. %app_name% works across multiple devices and keeps content in sync for you so you don't have to worry.
create_share: Cruthaigh, Roinn agus Athúsáid [[ Create, Share and Reuse
create_share_content_1: Níl aon duine ag iarraidh tosú ón tús agus sraith clár cumarsáide á chruthú. Ligeann %app_name% duit cláir chumarsáide cruthaithe ag daoine eile a aimsiú agus a phearsantú go héasca. Agus spreagann %app_name% ceadúnais oscailte ábhair agus siombailí, mar sin ní gá duit a bheith ag smaoineamh an bhfuil cóipcheart á bhriseadh agat áit éigin de thimpiste. [[ Nobody wants to start from scratch when creating a set of communication boards. %app_name% lets you easily discover and personalize communication boards created by others. And %app_name% encourages open licenses of content and symbols, so you don't have to wonder if you're breaking copyright somewhere on accident.
open_board_support: Tá %app_name% tiomanta do chláir a oscailt agus in-athúsáidte. Chomh mór sin gur thosaigh muid an tionscnamh OpenBoards chun oibriú i dtreo formáid comhaid chaighdeánach le haghaidh boird a allmhairiú agus a easpórtáil thar gach aip agus gléas, agus úsáidimid an fhormáid sin mar ár bhformáid dúchais iompórtála/onnmhairithe. Nuair a bhíonn an tsaoirse againn tógáil ar smaointe agus ar rath a chéile is cuma cén áit ar tháinig siad, bíonn an bua ag gach duine. [[ %app_name% is committed to making boards open and reusable. So much so that we started the OpenBoards initiative to work toward a standard file format for importing and exporting boards across all apps and devices, and we use that format as our native import/export format. When we have the freedom to build off of each other's ideas and successes regardless of where they came from, everyone wins.
coordination_content_1: Is uafásach an rud é gléas cumarsáide duine aonair a thógáil uathu chun é a ríomhchlárú, tógann sé a nguth. Ligeann %app_name% do theiripeoirí, speisialtóirí, tuismitheoirí agus baill foirne eile an tacar cumarsáide a mhodhnú agus fiú nótaí seisiúin agus teachtaireachtaí a logáil in áit inar féidir le gach duine leas a bhaint astu. [[ Having to take an individual's communication device away from them in order to program it is a terrible thing, it takes away their voice. %app_name% lets therapists, specialists, parents and other team members modify the communication set and even log session notes and messages in a place where everyone can benefit from them.
insights_content_1: Uaireanta bíonn sé deacair a fháil amach cad atá ag obair agus cad nach bhfuil. Is próiseas leanúnach é cumarsáid mhéadaithe chun stór focal a mhodhnú agus a thabhairt isteach, agus gan tuairiscí maithe is deacair a bheith cinnte cad is gá a athrú. Is féidir le %app_name% gach cumarsáid a logáil agus tuairiscí léargasacha a sholáthar bunaithe ar am, suíomh agus stór focal a fhágann go mbeidh sé níos soiléire do gach duine cén áit ar cheart dóibh a n-iarrachtaí a dhíriú chun na torthaí is fearr a bhaint amach. [[ Sometimes it's really hard to know what's working and what's not. Augmentative communication is an ongoing process of modifying and introducing vocabulary, and without good reports it's difficult to be sure what needs to change. %app_name% can log all communications and provide insightful reports based on time, location and vocabulary that makes it clearer for everyone just where to focus their efforts for the best results.
security_content_1: Soláthraíonn %app_name% cumarsáid agus stóráil shlán ar gach clár, loga agus faisnéis úsáideora. Ní roinnimid faisnéis phríobháideach amhail sonraí úsáideoirí, cláir phríobháideacha agus logaí úsáide gan cead sainráite. Glacaimid príobháideacht an úsáideora thar a bheith dáiríre mar, ag deireadh an lae, is é an rud a bhfuilimid ag caint faoi go bhféadfaí gach rud a deir duine a thaifeadadh riamh. Tá an cineál sin faisnéise tuillte a chosaint. [[ %app_name% provides secure communication and storage of all boards, logs and user information. We do not share private information like user data, private boards and usage logs without explicit permission. We take user privacy extremely seriously because, at the end of the day, what we're talking about is potentially recording everything an individual ever says. That kind of information deserves to be protected.
open_source_content_1: Tá an chuid is mó de na córais AAC tógtha ar theicneolaíocht dhílseánaigh, rud a chiallaíonn nach bhfuil a fhios agat i ndáiríre cé chomh slán agus atá siad, tá sé níos éasca a bheith faoi ghlas agus iallach a chur ar a mbealach chun rudaí a dhéanamh. Is foinse oscailte é CoughDrop agus tógadh le meon oscailte, ionas gur féidir leat a fheiceáil duit féin cad a théann isteach sa chóras, agus bíonn rochtain éasca agat agus easpórtálacha ar do shonraí go léir i gcónaí. [[ Most AAC systems are built on proprietary technology, which means you don't really know how secure they are, it's easier to get locked in and forced into their way of doing things. CoughDrop is open source and built with an open mindset, so you can see for yourself what goes into the system, and you always have easy access and exports for all your data.
welcome_with_steps: Fáilte go %app_name%! Ba cheart duit ríomhphost deimhnithe a fháil i do bhosca isteach go luath. Idir an dá linn seo chugainn roinnt céimeanna éasca eile. Is féidir leat filleadh ar an liosta seo am ar bith ón deais, níl le déanamh ach an lógó a bhualadh sa chúinne uachtarach agus an liosta seo a oscailt arís. [[ Welcome to %app_name%! You should get a confirmation email in your inbox soon. In the mean time here's some easy next steps. You can get back to this list anytime from the dashboard, just hit the logo in the top corner then open this list again.
intro_explanation: Pioc roinnt rudaí bunúsacha faoi cad is %app_name% ann agus conas a oibríonn sé. [[ Pick up some basics about what %app_name% is and how it works.

home_board_explanation: Is é do bhord baile an áit a rachaidh tú de réir réamhshocraithe nuair is mian leat labhairt. [[ Your home board is where you'll go by default when you want to speak.
add_app_to_your_device: Cuir an aip le do ghléas [[ Add the app to your device
app_explanation: Ritheann %app_name% i mbrabhsálaithe gréasáin, ach is féidir leat é a fháil sna siopaí aipeanna freisin [[ %app_name% runs in web browsers, but you can also find it in the app stores

update_your_profile: Nuashonraigh do phróifíl [[ Update your profile
profile_explanation: Seiceáil d'ainm, do r-phost, d'fhógraí agus do bheathaisnéis bhunúsach. [[ Check your name, email, notifications, and basic bio.
pick_subscription: Socraigh síntiús [[ Set up a subscription
subscription_explanation: Ceannaigh %app_name% chun leanúint ar aghaidh ag baint úsáide as nuair a bheidh deireadh le do réamhamharc saor in aisce. [[ Purchase %app_name% to keep using it after your free preview has ended.
skip_setup: Táim Críochnaithe leis an Seicliosta seo [[ I'm Done with this Checklist
download_log: Íoslódáil an logáil isteach [[ Download Log
generating_log: Clár a chruthú le haghaidh comhad a íoslódáil. . [[ Generating log file for download...
error_downloading_log: Tharla earráid agus an comhad loga á íoslódáil [[ There was an error download the log file
confirm_user_log_download: Ginfidh %app_name% comhad ina bhfuil stair iomlán de na logaí %{un} mar logchomhad oscailte< /a> ar féidir leat a íoslódáil agus a roinnt le d'fhoireann nó a uaslódáil chuig córas eile. Má tá %app_name% in úsáid agat le fada an lá, seans go dtógfaidh sé seo tamall. Ar mhaith leat leanúint ar aghaidh? [[ %app_name% will generate a file containing a full history of the %{un}'s logs as an open board log file which you can download and share with your team or upload into another system. If you have been using %app_name% for a long time then this could take a while. Would you like to continue?

new_note_for: Nóta Nua do %{user_name} [[ New Note for %{user_name}
notify_others: Cuir an teachtaireacht seo in iúl do dhaoine eile [[ Notify others of this message
alert_user: Seol foláireamh chuig an gcumarsóir faoin teachtaireacht seo [[ Send an alert to the communicator about this message

org_added: curtha leis ag eagraíocht [[ added by organization
add_user_supervisor: Cuir Maoirseoir leis le haghaidh %{uname} [[ Add Supervisor for %{uname}
add_supervisee: Déan Maoirseoir duine éigin eile Mise [[ Make Me someone else's Supervisor
add_other_supervisee: Déan %{uname} mar Mhaoirseoir do dhuine éigin eile [[ Make %{uname} someone else's Supervisor
supervisor_adding_explainer: Ar chúiseanna slándála, ní mór do chumarsáidí tú a chur mar mhaoirseoir óna gcuntas. Ar ghléas nó cuntas an chumarsáideora, cuir isteach d’ainm úsáideora chun tú féin a chur isteach mar mhaoirseoir. [[ For security reasons, communicators must add you as a supervisor from their account. On the communicator's device or account, enter your user name to add yourself as a supervisor.
external_auth_orgs: Organna atá Fíordheimhnithe go Seachtrach [[ Externally-Authenticated Orgs
my_supervisees: Daoine a Maoirsím [[ People I Supervise
loading_more: Ag lódáil níos mó... [[ Loading more...
error_loading_connections: Tharla earráid agus úsáideoirí maoirseachta á lódáil [[ There was an error loading supervision users
remove_this_goal: Bain an Sprioc seo [[ Remove this Goal
delete_or_retire: Ar mhaith leat an sprioc seo a scriosadh go hiomlán, nó díreach é a scor agus é a choinneáil mar sprioc san am atá caite? Tá spriocanna scriosta imithe go deo, ach tá spriocanna san am atá caite fós ar fáil chun athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar dhul chun cinn agus tuarascálacha. [[ Would you like to delete this goal completely, or just retire it and keep it as a past goal? Deleted goals are gone forever, but past goals are still available to review progress and reports.
confirm_delete_goal: An bhfuil tú cinnte gur mhaith leat an sprioc seo a scriosadh? Ní bheidh aon dul chun cinn agus tuarascálacha a ghabhann leis an sprioc ar fáil a thuilleadh. [[ Are you sure you want to delete this goal? Any progress and reports attached to the goal will no longer be available.
error_deleting_goal: Tharla earráid agus iarracht á déanamh an sprioc a nuashonrú [[ There was an error trying to update the goal
add_board_to_sidebar: Cuir an Bord leis an mBarra Taoibh [[ Add Board to Sidebar
sidebar_boards_explanation: Is sraith de naisc thapa é an barra taoibh is féidir leat a úsáid chun léim chuig cláir a úsáidtear go coitianta seachas an clár baile. Is féidir é a bheith úsáideach le haghaidh tacair boird atá sonrach don scoil nó don bhaile, frásaí tapa, rochtain mhéarchláir, etc. [[ The sidebar is a set of quick links you can use to jump to commonly-used boards other than the home board. It can be useful for school or home-specific board sets, quick phrases, keyboard access, etc.
set_home_lock_sidebar: Socraigh mar Bhaile sealadach nuair a luchtaítear é ón mbarra taoibh [[ Set as temporary Home when loaded from the sidebar

add_to_sidebar_failed: Theip ar chur leis an mbarra taoibh gan choinne [[ Adding to sidebar failed unexpectedly
adding_to_sidebar: Ag cur leis an mBarra Taoibh... [[ Adding to Sidebar...
find_out_more: Nua do %app_name%? Tuilleadh eolais a fháil. [[ New to %app_name%? Find out more.
never_show_button: Ná Taispeáin Button [[ Never Show Button

always_disable_link: Díchumasaigh Nasc i gcónaí [[ Always Disable Link
