disable_link_until_level: Díchumasaigh Nasc Go dtí an Leibhéal [[ Disable Link Until Level
inflections_overlay_description: Nuair a chumasaíonn úsáideoirí inflections agus brú fada ar an gcnaipe, seo iad na roghanna a fheicfidh siad: [[ When users enable inflections and long-press on the button, these are the options they will see:
see_language_for_inflections: Féach an rannán "Teanga" le haghaidh infhilleadh in aghaidh na teanga [[ See the "Language" section for per-language inflections
please_see: Féach le do thoil [[ Please see
app_store_link: liostú san App Store. [[ listing in the App Store.
google_app_store_link: liostú sa Google Play Store. [[ listing in the Google Play Store.
amazon_app_store_link: liostú sa Amazon App Store. [[ listing in the Amazon App Store.
windows_explainer: Is féidir leat %app_name% a shuiteáil mar aip deisce Windows ar do ríomhaire nó gléas Windows. Tá roinnt comhtháthú rianaithe súl ag CoughDrop ar Windows a chabhróidh leis oibriú níos fearr le níos mó feistí. Déan cinnte le do thoil an leagan ceart a íoslódáil do do chóras oibriúcháin. [[ You can install %app_name% as a Windows desktop app on your computer or Windows device. CoughDrop on Windows has some eye-tracking integrations that will help it work better with more devices. Please make sure to download the right version for your operating system.
browser_explainer: Is feidhmchlár gréasáin den chéad uair é %app_name%, agus ba cheart go n-oibreodh sé le go leor brabhsálaithe gréasáin nua-aimseartha. D’fhéadfadh go mbeadh corrlaigh ag roinnt brabhsálaithe a chuireann cosc ar ghnéithe áirithe oibriú, cuir in iúl dúinn le do thoil má tharlaíonn sé seo. Le do thoil, smaoinigh ar Chrome a úsáid mar do bhrabhsálaí réamhshocraithe má tá fadhbanna comhoiriúnachta agat. [[ %app_name% is a web-first application, and should work with many modern web browsers. Some browsers may have quirks that prevent certain features from working, if this happens please let us know. Please consider using Chrome as your default browser if you are running into compatibility issues.
email_sent: Ríomhphost seolta! Bí cinnte a sheiceáil le do fhillteán turscair! [[ Email sent! Be sure to check your spam folder!
password_reset_prompt: Cuir isteach d’ainm úsáideora nó do sheoladh ríomhphoist agus seolfaimid nasc chugat ar ríomhphost is féidir leat a úsáid chun do phasfhocal a athshocrú. [[ Please enter your username or email address and we'll email you a link you can use to reset your password.
approve_board_share: Scair an Bhoird a cheadú [[ Approve Board Share
share_warning: Roinneadh an clár seo, %{board_key} leat. Ar mhaith leat glacadh leis an sciar seo? Coinnigh i gcuimhne go mbeidh aon duine a bhfuil an leibhéal sciar céanna agat in ann aon bhoird a chruthaigh tú atá nasctha ón mbord seo a fheiceáil freisin. [[ This board, %{board_key} has been shared with you. Would you like to accept this share? Keep in mind that anyone with the same share level as you will be able to see any boards you have created that are linked from this board as well.
includes_downstream_editing: , cead eagarthóireachta ar seo agus cláir iartheachtacha ó aon údar [[ , editing permission on this and downstream boards by any author
updating_share_status: Stádas scaireanna á nuashonrú... [[ Updating share status...
approve_share: Ceadaigh an Roinn seo [[ Approve This Share
reject_share: Diúltaigh don Chomhroinn seo [[ Reject This Share

error_changing_board_key: Earráid agus Eochair Bhoird á Athrú [[ Error Changing Board Key

[[ This board supports multiple languages. You can quickly switch between languages for both the text labels and the system-generated speech.

Níl roinnt gnéithe, lena n-áirítear an ceann seo, ar fáil do chuntais mhúnlaithe amháin. Le do thoil [[ %app_name% is a powerful, flexible communication tool with lots of great features. Some features, including this one, are not available for modeling-only accounts. Please

try_this_board: Bain triail as an mBord seo [[ Try This Board

button_count_prompt:
Go hiontach! Seo an chuma a bheidh ar do bhord baile faoi láthair. Más mian leat, is féidir leat é a mhionchoigeartú chun níos lú cnaipe nó níos mó a thaispeáint chun tús a chur leis. Is féidir leat tosú ag an mbunleibhéal le cúpla cnaipí, nó gach rud a thaispeáint láithreach.

Is féidir leat líon na gcnaipí a thaispeántar a athrú go héasca ar ball ach an leibhéal don chumarsáid a choigeartú. [[ Great! Here's what your home board will look like right now. If you want, you can fine-tune it to show fewer or more button to start off. You can start at a basic level with only a few buttons, or show everything right away.

You can easily change the number of buttons shown later by adjusting the level for the communicator.
grid_prompt:
iontach! Ansin déanaimis amach cén méid cnaipí a oibreoidh is fearr! Má tá na cnaipí rómhór, ní bheidh spás ann le fás thar am -- déan iarracht an méid is lú a aimsiú gur féidir le do chumarsáideoir a úsáid go hiontaofa.

Cuimhnigh gur féidir leat cnaipí a chur i bhfolach i gcónaí má tá siad mór tá bord ró-dhian ar dtús, ach tá sé níos deacra méid an ghreille a athrú níos déanaí. [[ Splendid! Next let's figure out what size of buttons will work best! If the buttons are too big then there won't be room to grow over time -- try to find the smallest size that your communicator can reliably use.

Remember that you can always hide buttons if a large board is overwhelming at first, but it's harder to change the grid size later.
base_level_search_prompt: A ligean ar cabhrú leat teacht ar bord baile nua! Ar an gcéad dul síos, cé chomh compordach is atá an cumarsáid le haipeanna cainte agus le cnagadh chun roghanna a dhéanamh? Is féidir leat an chéim seo a scipeáil má tá an bord baile ceart agat cheana féin. [[ Let's help you find a new home board! First thing, how comfortable is the communicator with speech apps and tapping to make choices? You can skip this step if you've already got the right home board.

bulk_purchase_explainer: Is breá linn oibriú le ceantair scoile agus eagraíochtaí atá ag iarraidh tacaíocht a thabhairt do chumarsáidí iolracha! Más spéis leat ceadúnais iolracha a cheannach, PCard a úsáid, nó ceannach gan cárta creidmheasa a úsáid, téigh i dteagmháil lenár bhfoireann díolacháin le tuilleadh eolais a fháil. Tabhair faoi deara go n-oibreoidh go leor ríomhairí pearsanta lenár gcóras próiseála cártaí creidmheasa ar líne freisin. [[ We love working with school districts and organizations who want to support multiple communicators! If you're interested in purchasing multiple licenses, using a PCard, or purchasing without using a credit card, please contact our sales team for more information. Note that many PCards will work with our online credit card processing system as well.
after_free_trial: Nó tosaigh le triail saor in aisce 2 mhí agus cinntigh go n-oibríonn sé duit. [[ Or start with a 2-month free trial and make sure it works for you.
expiration_notes_pre: Nílimid ag iarraidh glór duine ar bith a dhúnadh, fiú má éiríonn maoiniú ina fhadhb gan choinne. Nuair a rachaidh síntiús úsáideora in éag oibreoidh %app_name% mar chóras cumarsáide fós ach díchumasófar príomhghnéithe amhail nótaí tuairiscithe agus físeáin. [[ We don't want to shut off anyone's voice, even if funding unexpectedly becomes an issue down the line. When a user's subscription expires %app_name% will still work as a communication system but premium features like reporting and video notes will be disabled.

Mura réitíonn sé sin an fhadhb, bain triail as brabhsálaí eile nó déan teagmháil lenár bhfoireann tacaíochta. If that doesn't correct the problem, please try a different browser or contact our support team.

robust_1: D’fhéadfadh cuma rud beag imeaglach a bheith ar stór focal láidre ar dtús, ach is féidir gur tacair chumhachtacha teanga iad ar féidir leis an gcumarsóir fás orthu le himeacht ama. Déan iarracht díriú níos mó ar cé mhéad cnaipí is féidir leis an gcumarsóir a rochtain go rathúil seachas cé chomh gnóthach is atá an scáileán, mar is féidir leat cnaipí a cheilt i gcónaí agus pleanáil chun iad a athchumasú níos déanaí. Féadfaidh na tacair cláir seo béim a chur ar phleanáil mhótair nó ar chumarsáid phragmatach, ach tá cnuasach maith croífhocail agus sainfhocail acu go léir, agus spás le haghaidh stór focal pearsantaithe freisin. [[ Robust vocabularies may seem a little intimidating at first, but they can be powerful language sets that the communicator can grow into over time. Try to focus more on how many buttons the communicator can successfully access rather than how busy the screen is, because you can always hide buttons and plan to re-enable them later. These board sets can have an emphasis on motor planning or pragmatic communication, but all have a good collection of core and specialized words, and room for personalized vocabulary as well.
cause_effect_1: Maidir le cumarsáidí atá úrnua do AAC, bíonn sé tairbheach uaireanta tosú le bord neamhchumarsáide, díreach chun cabhrú leo a fhoghlaim gur féidir leo cnaipí a bhuail agus go dtarlóidh rudaí. Is féidir leis na cláir chúise agus éifeachta seo cabhrú le cumarsáidí a oiliúint conas a modh rochtana a úsáid ar bhealach spraíúil. [[ For communicators that are brand-new to AAC, sometimes it's beneficial to start with a non-communication board, just to help them learn that they can hit buttons and things will happen. These cause-and-effect boards can help train communicators how to use their access method in a fun way.
simple_starts_1: I gcás roinnt cumarsáide is féidir le tosú le sraith bheag de chnaipí simplí cabhrú leo a bheith compordach ag baint úsáide as AAC. D’fhéadfadh sé a bheith níos deacra aistriú ó thacar cláir shimplí go rud níos láidre nó níos fadtéarmaí, ach tá gach cumarsáid difriúil. [[ For some communicators starting with a small set of simple buttons can help them get comfortable using AAC. It can be trickier to move from a simple board set to something more robust or long-term, but each communicator is different.
functional_1: Uaireanta is féidir le béim ar chumarsáid níos feidhmiúla a bheith luachmhar do chumarsáidí. Ag brath ar leibhéal forbartha an chumarsáide agus é ag tosú ar AAC a úsáid, is féidir le boird fheidhmiúla a bheith níos iomasach. [[ Sometimes an emphasis on more functional communication can be of value for communicators. Depending on a communicator's developmental level when starting to use AAC, functional boards can be more intuitive.
phrases_1: Do chumarsáideoirí atá in ann labhairt, is féidir a nguth féin a thaifeadadh le haghaidh athsheinm a bheith ina chuidiú i gcásanna struis, nó le haghaidh coinníollacha meathlúcháin ar nós ALS. Is féidir le boird frása-bhunaithe a bheith ina teimpléad úsáideach do na cumarsáidí seo, agus oibríonn siad go maith le huirlisí taifeadta ionsuite %app_name% chun bainc teachtaireachta a chruthú go héasca don chumarsáidí. [[ For communicators that can speak, recording their own voice for playback can be helpful in stressful situations, or for degenerative conditions like ALS. Phrase-based boards can be a useful template for these communicators, and work well with %app_name%'s built-in recording tools to easily create message banks for the communicator.
keyboards_1: Tacaíonn %app_name% le méarchláir saincheaptha lena n-áirítear tuar focal, agus mar sin is féidir le cumarsáidí atá in ann litriú go hinniúil leas a bhaint as tacair cláir mhéarchláir. Tagann roinnt méarchláir le frásaí gasta nó focail choitianta chun cuidiú le cumarsáid a bhrostú. [[ %app_name% supports custom keyboards that include word prediction, so communicators that can spell proficiently may benefit from keyboard-based board sets. Some keyboards come with quick phrases or common words to help speed up communication.

core_explainer: Is focail a úsáidtear go minic iad croífhocail a mbíonn bríonna iolracha acu nó a bhfuil rún iolra acu. Tá siad úsáideach i go leor suíomhanna éagsúla, agus is focail ard-minicíochta luachmhara iad do go leor cumarsáidí. Brabhsáil an liosta le haghaidh aon chroífhocail a d’fhéadfadh ciall a bhaint as don chlár reatha. [[ Core words are frequently-used words that often have multiple meanings or intents. They are useful in lots of different settings, and are valuable high-frequency words for many communicators. Browse the list for any core words that might make sense for the current board.
fringe_explainer: Is focail speisialaithe nó sainiúla iad imeallfhocail, cosúil le daoine nó cineálacha bia. Ba cheart go mbeadh teacht ag cumarsáideoirí ar fhocail imeallacha a léiríonn a leasanna, a gceangal agus na rudaí a bhfuil siad ag foghlaim fúthu. Brabhsáil na catagóirí chun focail a aimsiú nó faigh smaointe d’fhocail a d’fhéadfaí a chur leis an gclár reatha. [[ Fringe words are specialized or specific words, like people or types of food. Communicators should have access to fringe words that represent their interests, connections, and things they are learning about. Browse the categories to find words or get ideas for words that could be added to the current board.
recordings_explainer: D’fhéadfadh sé a bheith úsáideach do chumarsáideoirí áirithe focail nó frásaí a thaifeadadh a bheidh siad ag iarraidh a úsáid ar bhealach níos éasca sa todhchaí. Is féidir leat frásaí a roghnú ón liosta taifeadtaí chun iad a chur go tapa leis an gclár reatha. [[ It can be useful for some communicators to record words or phrases that they will want to use more easily in the future. You can select phrases from the list of recordings to have them quickly added to the current board.
requests_explainer: Is féidir le cumarsáidí agus maoirseoirí iarraidh go gcuirfí focail lena stór focal. Áirítear ar an liosta seo na focail go léir a iarradh le haghaidh cumarsáide. Is féidir leat ceann ar bith a roghnú chun iad a chur leis an gclár reatha. [[ Communicators and supervisors can request to have words added to their vocabulary set. This list includes all the words that have been requested for a communicator. You can select any to have them added to the current board.

[[ The button stash makes it easier to reuse or move buttons across multiple boards. Buttons that you copy to your stash will appear here once there are any. To copy a button to the stash either drag it to the stash button or click the copy button in the General settings area for the button.

aac_intro_1: Go raibh maith agat as clárú le haghaidh %app_name%! Tá sceitimíní orainn go bhfuil tú anseo agus tá súil againn go ndéanfaidh %app_name% difríocht. Sula gcuirfimid isteach ar roinnt bunúsacha %app_name%, bhíomar ag iarraidh beagán cainte a dhéanamh faoi AAC. [[ Thanks for signing up for %app_name%! We're excited you're here and hope %app_name% makes a difference. Before we get into some %app_name% basics, we wanted to talk a little about AAC.
aac_intro_2: Uirlis is ea AAC (Cumarsáid Mhéadaithe agus Mhalartach) chun cuidiú le daoine atá ag forbairt cumarsáidí a chloisteáil. Is cineál AAC é %app_name% ina roghnaíonn tú cnaipí a léiríonn focail nó litreacha agus labhraíonn an gléas cibé rud a roghnaíonn an t-úsáideoir. [[ AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication) is a tool to help developing communicators be heard. %app_name% is a type of AAC where you select buttons that represent words or letters and the device speaks whatever the user selects.
aac_board_examples: Samplaí Boird AAC [[ AAC Board Examples
aac_intro_22: Is féidir le AAC difríocht mhór a dhéanamh do dhaoine a bhfuil am crua acu ag labhairt leo féin. Go hidéalach d’fhéadfadh úsáideoirí roghnú as aon fhocal san fhoclóir, ach mura bhfuil an litriú mar rogha, ní mór dúinn na focail agus na frásaí cearta a roghnú go cúramach chun cabhrú le gach duine cumarsáid éifeachtach a dhéanamh. [[ AAC can make a huge difference for people who have a hard time speaking on their own. Ideally users could pick from any word in the dictionary, but if spelling isn't an option, we need to carefully choose the right words and phrases to best help each individual communicate effectively.
aac_intro_3: In %app_name% cuirimid focail agus frásaí ar chnaipí atá eagraithe mar bhailiúchán "clár". Tá tacair boird éagsúla ann do go leor úsáideoirí agus riachtanais éagsúla. [[ In %app_name% we put words and phrases on buttons that are organized as a collection of "boards". There are different board sets for many different users and needs.
choosing_vocabulary: Roghnú na Stór Focal Ceart [[ Choosing the Right Vocabulary
core_words_1: Tá sé tábhachtach úsáideoir a thosú leis na focail chearta -- agus deacair! Conas a shocraíonn tú cé na focail ba chóir a bheith ag duine éigin? [[ Starting a user with the right words is important -- and hard! How do you decide which words someone should have at their fingertips?
core_words_2: Smaoiníonn go leor daoine ar dtús faoi chumarsáid bunaithe ar riachtanais ("Ní mór dom dul go dtí an seomra folctha", "tá mé gortaithe", "tá ocras orm"), agus is rudaí tábhachtacha iad seo le bheith in ann a chur in iúl. Mar sin féin, tá sé an-luachmhar freisin iarracht a dhéanamh focail choiteanna a chur san áireamh is féidir a úsáid ar níos mó ná bealach amháin. Glaoimid focail "lárnacha" ar na cineálacha focail seo. [[ Many people think first about needs-based communication ("I need to go to the bathroom", "I am hurting", "I am hungry"), and these are important things to be able to express. However, it's also very valuable to try to include common words that can be used in more than one way. We call these types of words "core" words.
core_words_3: Is éard atá i gcroífhocail ná focail cosúil le "tú", "mé", "is maith liom", "ní", "téigh", "isteach", etc. B'fhéidir nach cosúil go bhfuil siad chomh úsáideach láithreach, ach le himeacht ama d'úsáideoir atá faoi lé croí. is féidir le focail go leor smaointe éagsúla a chur in iúl ("Is maith liom é", "ní theastaíonn uait", "gheofá é", "cén uair is féidir linn dul ann") agus a stór focal a dhoimhniú ar bhealach níos éifeachtaí. [[ Core words are words like "you", "I", "like", "not", "go", "in", etc. They may not seem as useful right away, but over time a user who is exposed to core words can express many different ideas ("I like it", "not want", "you get it", "when can we go there") and more effectively deepen their vocabulary.
core_words_4: Bíonn gach úsáideoir difriúil, ach is minic gur féidir le meascán d’fhocail agus frásaí lárnacha agus speisialaithe cuidiú le cumarsáidí a gcuid cainte a mhéadú de réir a chéile, in ionad a bheith i bhfostú gan ach riachtanais agus mianta a chur in iúl. [[ Every user is different, but a combination of core and specialized words and phrases can often help a communicator grow their expression gradually, instead of being stuck only expressing needs and wants.
selecting_a_home_board: Bord Tí a Roghnú [[ Selecting a Home Board
home_board_1: Tá roinnt clár baile éagsúil ag %app_name% ar féidir leat tosú á n-úsáid láithreach, nó iad a chóipeáil agus a oiriúnú de réir mar a théann tú ar aghaidh. Tá cúpla cnaipí móra ag roinnt boird, agus tá go leor cnaipí beaga ag cuid acu. [[ %app_name% has a number of different home boards that you can start using right away, or copy and personalize as you go. Some boards have a few large buttons, and some have many small buttons.
home_board_2: Ciallaíonn níos mó cnaipí níos mó roghanna le haghaidh cur in iúl, ach tá roinnt úsáideoirí teoranta ó thaobh cé chomh beag agus is féidir le cnaipe a bhuail go hiontaofa (cuimhnigh gur féidir leat cnaipí a cheilt i gcónaí ar mhaith leat a chur leis níos déanaí, mar sin d'fhéadfadh bord a bhfuil cuma "róghnóthach" air. i ndáiríre rud ar féidir leo fás isteach ann le himeacht ama). [[ More buttons means more options for expression, but some users are limited in how small a button they can reliably hit (keep in mind you can always hide buttons for now that you want to add later, so a board that looks "too busy" may actually be something they can grow into over time).
speak_mode_2: Nuair a bhíonn tú i Mód Labhairt is féidir leat cnaipí a bhualadh chun iad a labhairt, agus iad a chur leis an mbosca gutha ag an mbarr. Má bhuaileann tú an bosca gutha labhróidh sé na cnaipí go léir atá suite ann. Is féidir leis an gcúlspás agus na cnaipí soiléire cuidiú leis an bhfuinneog abairte a choinneáil glan. [[ When you're in Speak Mode you can hit buttons to have them spoken, and added to the vocalization box at the top. If you hit the vocalization box it'll speak all the buttons that are located there. The backspace and clear buttons can help keep the sentence window clean.
coughdrop_speak_mode_folders: %app_name% Fillteáin Mhód Speak [[ %app_name% Speak Mode Folders
speak_mode_22: Is cnaipí nasctha iad na cnaipí a bhfuil deilbhín fillteán beag orthu, rud a chiallaíonn má roghnaíonn tú iad go dtógfaidh sé chuig bord eile tú. Ligeann sé seo duit leibhéil iolracha a bheith agat, le níos mó focal agus frásaí ná mar a d’fhéadfadh a bheith oiriúnach ar scáileán amháin. Is féidir leat filleadh ar an gcéad chlár i gcónaí ach an cnaipe baile a bhualadh. [[ Buttons that have a little folder icon on them are linked buttons, which means that if you select them it will take you to another board. This lets you have multiple levels, with more words and phrases than could fit on a single screen. You can always get back to the first board by hitting the home button.
coughdrop_exiting_speak_mode: %app_name% Mód Labhairt á Scor [[ %app_name% Exiting Speak Mode
speak_mode_3: Is féidir leat éirí as Mód Labhair trí bhualadh ar an roghchlár úsáideora sa chúinne uachtarach ar dheis. Má tá imní ort faoi úsáideoir a fhágann Mód Speak de thaisme ina n-aonar, is féidir leat PIN a shocrú i sainroghanna an úsáideora. [[ You can exit out of Speak Mode by hitting the user menu in the top right corner. If you're worried about a user accidentally exiting Speak Mode on their own, you can set up a PIN in the user's preferences.
intro_modeling_3: In %app_name%, tugtar "maoirseoirí" ar an bhfoireann tacaíochta timpeall an chumarsáide. Is úsáideoirí iad maoirseoirí atá ag samhaltú le haghaidh cumarsáide agus ag obair le cumarsáidí. Tá a logáil isteach féin acu, agus d'fhéadfadh sé a bheith ina mhúinteoir nó ina theiripeoir, ina thuismitheoir, ina cúramóir, etc. [[ In %app_name%, the support team around the communicator are called "supervisors". Supervisors are users that are modeling for and working with a communicator. They have their own login, and might be a teacher or a therapist, a parent, a caregiver, etc.
intro_modeling_4: Cuirtear maoirseoirí lena gcuntas cumarsáide, agus is féidir leo cláir chumarsáide a fheiceáil ar a ngléasanna féin, ionas gur féidir leo a bheith compordach le stór focal úsáideora le haghaidh samhaltú níos fearr, agus is féidir leo cnaipí agus frásaí nua a chur leis má tá cead eagarthóireachta acu. [[ Supervisors are added to their communicator's account, and can see a communicator's boards on their own devices, so they can get comfortable with a user's vocabulary for better modeling, and can add new buttons and phrases if they have editing permission.
logging_and_report: Logáil agus Tuarascálacha [[ Logging and Reports
reports_1: Is féidir le maoirseoirí athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar stair cumarsáide úsáideora freisin. Ar chúiseanna príobháideachta díchumasaítear logaí agus tuarascálacha de réir réamhshocraithe, ach má chumasaíonn tú iad is féidir le maoirseoirí an úsáideora a fheiceáil conas atá a gcumarsáid ag dul chun cinn le himeacht ama. [[ Supervisors can also review a user's communication history. For privacy reasons logs and reports are disabled by default, but if you enable them then the user's supervisors can see how their communication is progressing over time.
coughdrop_logs_and_notes: %app_name% Logchomhaid agus Nótaí [[ %app_name% Logs and Notes
reports_2: Chomh maith le stair úsáide a athbhreithniú, is féidir le maoirseoirí rochtain a fháil ar thuairiscí mionsonraithe ar gach seisiún cumarsáide, agus is féidir leo nótaí a dhéanamh agus a roinnt le foireann an úsáideora, ionas go mbeidh a fhios ag gach duine cad é an straitéis reatha agus cad atá nó nach bhfuil ag obair go maith. [[ In addition to reviewing usage history, supervisors can access detailed reports on each communication session, and can make and share notes with the user's team, so everyone knows what the current strategy is and what is or isn't working well.
where_to_learn_more: Cá Tuilleadh Eolais [[ Where to Learn More
getting_started_video: Físeán Tosaigh: Ag Tosú le %app_name% [[ Intro Video: Getting Started with %app_name%
youtube_channel: %app_name% Cainéal YouTube, le Walkthroughs [[ %app_name% YouTube Channel, with Walkthroughs
support_site: %app_name% Suíomh Tacaíochta, le CCanna [[ %app_name% Support Site, with FAQs
thanks_continue_learning: Go raibh maith agat as dul tríd an réamhrá seo chuig %app_name%! Tá súil agam go raibh sé ina chuidiú duit! Má tá ceisteanna agat nó más mian leat tuilleadh a fhoghlaim, is féidir leat roinnt acmhainní breise a sheiceáil. [[ Thanks for going through this introduction to %app_name%! Hopefully it was helpful for you! If you have questions or want to learn more, you can check out some additional resources.
more_resources_2: Má théann tú amú riamh is féidir leat an cnaipe “Tacaíocht” a bhualadh ag bun an deais chun cabhair a iarraidh, nó chun aiseolas a roinnt ar conas is féidir linn CoughDrop a fheabhsú. Táimid i gcónaí anseo chun cabhrú leat! [[ If you ever get lost you can always hit the "Support" button at the bottom of the dashboard to ask for help, or to share feedback on how we can improve CoughDrop. We're always here to help!
intro_video_instead: Féach ar an bhFís [[ Watch the Video
always_available_boards: Boird Ar Fáil i gcónaí [[ Always-Available Boards
offline_boards_explainer: Anseo thíos tá bailiúchán de bhoird éigeandála agus úsáide criticiúla saor in aisce agus atá ar fáil i gcónaí a chuirimid ar fáil in éineacht lenár gcomhpháirtithe. Beidh rochtain ag aon duine a íoslódálann an aip %app_name% ar na cláir seo, le nasc Idirlín nó gan nasc Idirlín. [[ Below is a collection of free and always-available emergency and critical-use boards that we provide along with our partners. Anyone who downloads the %app_name% app will have access to these boards, with or without an Internet connection.
translations_by: aistriúcháin arna soláthar ag [[ translations provided by
have_you_tried_modeling: Ar Bhain Tú Bain triail as samhaltú? [[ Have You Tried Modeling?
modeling_intro_1: Is cosúil go mór le foghlaim conas foclóir AAC a úsáid agus teanga nua a fhoghlaim. Bíonn sé i bhfad níos éasca nuair a úsáideann na daoine thart timpeall ort é freisin! Is féidir leat cabhrú trí shamhaltú, a thaispeánann samplaí de conas é a chur chugainn ("seo conas a d'fhéadfá é seo a rá" agus ansin buail na cnaipí duit féin). Uaireanta tógann sé go leor samhaltú sula leanann cumarsáidí do shampla, mar sin déan iarracht a bheith foighneach! [[ Learning to use an AAC vocabulary is a lot like learning a new language. It's much easier when the people around you use it too! You can help by modeling, which is showing examples of how to us it ("here's how you could say this" and then hit the buttons yourself). Sometimes it takes a lot of modeling before a communicator follows your example, so try to be patient!
modeling_intro_2: Agus tú ag samhaltú beidh tú ag iarraidh a chinntiú go bhfuil tú i mód samhaltaithe, ionas gur féidir le %app_name% an difríocht idir do chuid cainte agus cainte an chumarsáide a insint. Is féidir leat "múnla" a dhéanamh ar chumarsáidí ar do dheais, nó is féidir leat an cnaipe soiléir a thapáil faoi thrí chun dul isteach sa mhód samhaltaithe go sealadach. Bain triail as agus féach duit féin! [[ When modeling you'll want to make sure you're in modeling mode, so %app_name% can tell the difference between your speech and the communicator's. You can "model for" a communicator in your dashboard, or you can triple-tap the clear button to temporarily go into modeling mode. Give it a try and see for yourself!
thanks_coughdrop: Go raibh maith agat as triail a bhaint as %app_name% i do bhrabhsálaí gréasáin! Is taispeántas é seo atá á fheiceáil agat leabaithe i suíomh Gréasáin, mar sin níl sé teoranta don mhodh cainte amháin, ach má thugann tú cuairt ar an láithreán gréasáin ba cheart go mbeifeá in ann rochtain a fháil ar do chuntas mar is gnách. [[ Thanks for trying %app_name% in your web browser! This is a demo you're seeing embedded in a web site, so it's limited to speak mode only, but if you visit the web site you should be able to access your account as usual.
thanks_coughdrop_long: Go raibh maith agat as triail a bhaint as %app_name% i do bhrabhsálaí gréasáin! Seo taispeántas atá á fheiceáil agat leabaithe i suíomh Gréasáin, ach is aip chumhachtach cumarsáide mhéadaithe (AAC) é %app_name% ar féidir é a rith mar chluaisín féin i mbrabhsálaí ar ríomhaire deisce, nó í a íoslódáil i siopaí aipeanna ar tháibléad agus fóin chliste. Is féidir leat clárú le haghaidh triail saor in aisce agus féachaint an n-oibreoidh sé duit féin nó do dhuine éigin a bhfuil aithne agat air! [[ Thanks for trying %app_name% in your web browser! This is a demo you're seeing embedded in a web site, but %app_name% is a powerful augmentative communication (AAC) app that can run as it's own tab in a browser on a desktop, or be downloaded in app stores on tablets and smartphones. You can sign up for a free trial and see if it will work for you or someone you know!
back_to_demo: Ar ais go dtí an Taispeántas [[ Back to the Demo
contact_us_intro: Ceisteanna? Moltaí? Háicéis? Ba bhreá linn aon cheann acu a chloisteáil uait! Is é an sprioc atá againn acmhainn a thógáil a thacaíonn le cumarsáidí agus na foirne timpeall orthu ionas gur féidir linn cabhrú le guthanna daoine a chloisteáil. Ní féidir linn é sin a dhéanamh beagnach chomh maith gan cabhair agus rannpháirtíocht uait, mar sin seol líne chugainn le do thoil! [[ Questions? Suggestions? Haikus? We'd love to hear any of them from you! Our goal is to build a resource that supports communicators and the teams around them so we can help people's voices be heard. We can't do that nearly as well without help and participation from you, so please send us a line!
before_ticker: Sula ndéanann tú ticéad a chomhdú, le do thoil [[ Before filing a ticket, please
check_support_site: seiceáil ar ár suíomh tacaíochta [[ check our support site
support_through_site: le haghaidh ceisteanna coitianta. [[ for common questions.
confirm_copy_later: Níl cead agat an clár seo a chur in eagar go díreach, ach más mian leat is féidir leat athruithe a dhéanamh agus ansin cóip a shábháil nuair a bheidh tú críochnaithe. [[ You don't have permission to edit this board directly, but if you'd like you can make changes and then save a copy when you're finished.
edit_a_copy: Cuir Cóip in Eagar [[ Edit a Copy
not_online_connect: Níl sé ar líne, ceangail leis an Idirlíon chun torthaí a fheiceáil [[ Not online, connect to the Internet to see results
privacy_wont_work: Tá na socruithe príobháideachais ar do bhrabhsálaí ag cur cosc ar %app_name% feidhmiú go hiomlán, mar sin tá logáil isteach agus clárú díchumasaithe go sealadach. Úsáideann %app_name% stóras brabhsálaí le haghaidh rudaí mar aitheantas úsáideora, tacaíocht as líne agus feabhsuithe feidhmíochta. [[ The privacy settings on your browser are preventing %app_name% from fully functioning, so login and registration are temporarily disabled. %app_name% uses browser storage for things like user identity, offline support and performance improvements.
learn_privacy: Foghlaim tuilleadh faoi do bhrabhsálaí a chumrú chun %app_name% a rith [[ Learn more about configuring your browser to run %app_name%
browse_audio: brabhsáil fuaime stóráilte [[ browse stored audio
hold_other_speech_until_this_button_comp: Coinnigh caint eile go dtí go gcríochnaíonn an cnaipe seo [[ Hold other speech until this button completes
vocalization_sound_conflict: RABHADH: Bainfear ceangaltáin fuaime má tá luach sa réimse 'Speak' [[ WARNING: Sound attachments will be removed if there is a value in the 'Speak' field
error_recording_audio: Tharla earráid agus an fhuaim á thaifeadadh [[ There was an error while trying to record audio
modifying_via_tts: modhnóir trí Téacs-go-Caint [[ modifier via Text-To-Speech
record_or_upload_sound: Taifead nó uaslódáil fuaim [[ Record or upload a sound
invalid_code: Ní bhfuarthas bronntanas ar fáil don chód %{code}. Seans go bhfuil an cód fuascailte cheana féin, nó gur cuireadh an cód isteach go mícheart. Déan teagmháil leis an soláthraí le do thoil agus deimhnigh na sonraí. [[ No available gift was found for the code %{code}. It's possible the code has already been redeemed, or the code was entered incorrectly. Please contact the giver and confirm the details.
invalid_code_check_internet: Níorbh fhéidir bronntanas a fháil. Seiceáil do nasc Idirlín le do thoil. [[ No gift could be found. Please check your Internet connection.
gift_details: Tá ballraíocht den scoth ag duine éigin le %app_name% mar bhronntanas duit! Tabharfaidh an bronntanas seo rochtain saor in aisce duit ar %app_name% le haghaidh %{duration}. [[ Someone has shared a premium membership to %app_name% as a gift to you! This gift will give you free premium access to %app_name% for %{duration}.
or_hit_button: Chun é a fhuascailt, níl le déanamh ach an cnaipe thíos a bhrú. [[ To redeem it, just hit the button below.
login_for_redemption: Chun é a fhuascailt, beidh ort a bheith logáilte isteach, ansin é a ghníomhachtú ón leathanach billeála i do phróifíl nó tabhair cuairt ar an leathanach seo arís. [[ To redeem it, you'll need to be logged in, then activate it from the billing page in your profile or visit this page again.
redeem_gift: Faigh an Bronntanas seo [[ Redeem This Gift
before_redeem: Sular féidir leat an cód seo a fhuascailt beidh ort [[ Before you can redeem this code you'll need to
create_a_new_account: cuntas nua a chruthú [[ create a new account
retrieving_gift: Sonraí bronntanais á aisghabháil... [[ Retrieving gift details...
password_alternate_prompt: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte conas logáil isteach, cuir isteach do sheoladh ríomhphoist agus seolfaimid treoracha chugat maidir le conas an aip a rochtain ar do ghléas. [[ If you're unsure how to log in, please enter your email address and we'll send you instructions for how to access the app on your device.
error_copying_board: Tharla earráid agus an clár á chóipeáil [[ There was an error copying the board
error_sharing_board: Tharla earráid agus an clár á roinnt [[ There was an error sharing the board
copy_or_share_board: Seans nach bhfuil rochtain ag údar an bhoird reatha ar an gclár seo mar go bhfuil sé marcáilte príobháideach. Ar mhaith leat an bord seo a roinnt, nó cóip a dhéanamh de? [[ The current board's author may not have access to this board as it is marked private. Would you like to share this board, or make a copy of it?
copy_or_link_board: Is é duine eile seachas údar an bhoird reatha a chruthaigh an bord seo. Ar mhaith leat an clár a úsáid mar atá, nó cóip a dhéanamh de? [[ This board was created by someone other than the current board's author. Would you like to use the board as-is, or make a copy of it?

copy_this_board: Cóipeáil an Bord seo [[ Copy This Board

[[ This board already has some translations for this language. Would you like to switch to the existing translations as the new default languagee?

delete_this_sound: Bain an Fuaim seo [[ Remove this Sound
confirm_delete_recording: An bhfuil tú cinnte gur mhaith leat an taifeadadh seo a scriosadh? Ní oibreoidh aon cnaipí a úsáideann é a thuilleadh. [[ Are you sure you want to delete this recording? Any buttons using it will no longe work.
error_deleting_sound: Tharla earráid agus iarracht á déanamh an taifeadadh a scriosadh [[ There was an error trying to delete the recording
coughdrop_partners_and_supported_integra: %app_name% Comhpháirtithe agus Lánpháirtithe Tacaithe [[ %app_name% Partners and Supported Integrations
compatibility_intro: Tá %app_name% tiomanta do bheith ag obair le cuideachtaí agus eagraíochtaí eile chun an taithí is fearr is féidir a sholáthar do chumarsáidí. Seo cuid de na comhpháirtithe agus na hacmhainní comhoiriúnacha atá ar fáil againn. [[ %app_name% is committed to working with other companies and organizations to provide communicators with the best possible experience. Here are some of the partners and compatible resources we have available.
community_partners_explainer: Is comhpháirtithe teicniúla agus tacaíochta iad comhpháirtithe pobail a chuireann acmhainní agus uirlisí teicneolaíochta cúnta ar fáil ar féidir leo úsáid %app_name% a dhéanamh níos éifeachtaí do chumarsáideoirí áirithe agus dá bhfoirne tacaíochta. [[ Community partners are technical and support partners that provide assistive technology resources and tools that can also make %app_name% usage more effective for some communicators and their support teams.
frs_explainer: Oibríonn Forbes AAC le hárachas chun a táibléad tiomnaithe ProSlate a fháil maoinithe le %app_name% réamhshuiteáilte. [[ Forbes AAC works with insurance to get their ProSlate dedicated tablet funded with %app_name% pre-installed.
ablenet_explainer: Oibríonn AbleNet le hárachas chun a táibléad tiomnaithe QuickTalker FreeStyle a fháil maoinithe le %app_name% réamhshuiteáilte. [[ AbleNet works with insurance to get their QuickTalker FreeStyle dedicated tablet funded with %app_name% pre-installed.
acapela_explainer: Soláthraíonn Acapela guthanna sintéiseithe den scoth le haghaidh giniúna cainte. Glacann Acapela guthanna in %app_name% le haghaidh iOS, Android agus Windows. [[ Acapela provides premium synthesized voices for speech generation. Acapela voices in %app_name% for iOS, Android and Windows.
switch_explainer: Oibreoidh scanadh lasc-ghníomhachtaithe ionsuite %app_name% le gníomh lasc amháin nó dhó. Ba cheart go n-oibreodh an chuid is mó de lasca bluetooth murab é go léir % app_name% trí aithrise méarchláir, agus ar Windows is féidir lasca eile ar stíl an mhéarchláir a chumrú i sainroghanna úsáideora. [[ %app_name%'s built-in switch-activated scanning will work with one or two switch actions. Most if not all bluetooth switches should work with %app_name% via keyboard emulation, and on Windows other keyboard-style switches can also be configured in a user's preferences.
blue2_explainer: D'oibrigh an lasc Blue2 le gléasanna soghluaiste agus Windows agus soláthraíonn sé rialú lasc amháin agus dhá chnaipe [[ The Blue2 switch worked with mobile and Windows devices and provides one and two-button switch control
eye_trackers_explainer: Ar ghléasanna Windows, is féidir leat an aip %app_name% a íoslódáil agus a shuiteáil chun %app_name% a úsáid le lorgairí súl crua-earraí. Tá comhtháthú dúchasach ag roinnt lorgairí súl (EyeX agus EyeTribe) faoi láthair, agus oibríonn cinn eile (Tobii, myGaze, eyetech, etc.) go han-mhaith ag rith i mód cúrsóra. Is féidir socruithe amhail am cónaithe agus fad gníomhachtaithe a chumrú i sainroghanna úsáideora. [[ On Windows devices, you can download and install the %app_name% app to use %app_name% with hardware eye trackers. Some eye trackers (EyeX and EyeTribe) currently have native integrations, while others (Tobii, myGaze, eyetech, etc.) work very well running in cursor mode. Settings like dwell time and activation distance can be configured in a user's preferences.
head_pointers_and_mice: Leideanna Ceann agus lucha [[ Head Pointers and Mice
head_mouse_explainer: Is féidir an cúrsóir luiche ar Windows a rialú ag go leor cineálacha éagsúla comhéadan, lena n-áirítear roinnt leideanna ceanntásca agus uirlisí cinn luiche. Is féidir na haipeanna agus gléasanna seo a chumrú le rianú ionsuite %app_name%, atá ar fáil san aip Windows %app_name%. [[ The mouse cursor on Windows can be controlled by many different kinds of interface, including some header pointers and head mouse tools. These apps and devices can be configured using %app_name%'s built-in dwell tracking, available in the Windows %app_name% app.
camera_mouse_explainer: Is feidhmchlár Windows ceann-rianaithe saor in aisce é Camera Mouse a úsáideann ceamara an ríomhaire chun cúrsóir na luiche a rialú. [[ Camera Mouse is a free head-tracking Windows app that uses the computer's camera to control the mouse cursor.
bluetooth_speakers_explainer: Níl cainteoirí ard go leor ag roinnt gléasanna, nó tá cainteoirí acu a thugann an treo mícheart ionas nach gcuidíonn siad le cumarsáidí labhairt go héifeachtach. Is féidir cainteoirí Bluetooth a úsáid le %app_name% chun cumarsáid a éascú, agus fiú chun % app_name% a úsáid beagán níos mó spraoi. [[ Some devices don't have loud enough speakers, or have speakers that point the wrong direction so they don't help a communicator speak effectively. Bluetooth speakers can be used with %app_name% to facilitate communication, and even to make using %app_name% just a little more fun.
clipster_explainer: Is cainteoir bluetooth clip-on é ION Clipster atá in ann nascadh le gléasanna agus toirt breise agus fuaim díreach amach as an gcumarsáid a sholáthar. [[ ION Clipster is a clip-on bluetooth speaker that can connect to devices and provide additional volume and direct sound out in from of the communicator.
bluebee_explainer: Ainmhithe gleoite líonta iad Bluebee Pals a bhfuil cainteoir bluetooth ionsuite acu a bhogann a bhéal mar a labhraíonn siad. Is féidir leo a bheith ina n-uirlis athneartaithe iontach chun cumarsáidí a fhorbairt. [[ Bluebee Pals are cute stuffed animals with a built-in bluetooth speaker whose mouths move as they speak. They can be a great reinforcement tool for developing communicators.
keyguard_explainer: I gcás roinnt úsáideoirí is féidir go mbeadh sé deacair a méara a fháil síos ar na cnaipí cearta. Is féidir le gardaí eochair cabhrú leo nascleanúint a dhéanamh chuig an áit cheart, agus is féidir le roinnt cuideachtaí eochairghardaí saincheaptha a chruthú le haghaidh beagnach aon chumraíocht boird %app_name%. [[ For some users it can be hard to get their fingers down on the right buttons. Keyguards can help them navigate to the right place, and some companies can create custom keyguards for just about any %app_name% board configuration.
lasered_pics_explainer: Is féidir le Lasered Pics eochairghardaí saincheaptha a chruthú do go leor táibléad agus gléasanna éagsúla. Trí ghabháil scáileáin a sheoladh chucu ón ngléas is féidir leo tacú le go leor cumraíochtaí %app_name%. [[ Lasered Pics can create custom keyguards for many different tablets and devices. By sending them a screenshot from the device they can support many %app_name% configurations.
frs_keyguards_explainer: Is féidir le Forbes AAC gardaí eochair saincheaptha a chruthú le haghaidh cumraíochtaí éagsúla %app_name% a oibríonn lena táibléad tiomnaithe ProSlate. [[ Forbes AAC can create custom keyguards for different %app_name% configurations that work with their ProSlate dedicated tablets.
back_to_board_list: Ar ais go Liosta an Bhoird [[ Back to Board List
back_to_dashboard: Ar ais go dtí an Deais [[ Back to the Dashboard
edit_sound_details: Cuir Sonraí Taifeadta in Eagar [[ Edit Recording Details
error_updating_sound: Tharla earráid gan choinne agus an taifeadadh á nuashonrú [[ There was an unexpected error while updating the recording
two_way_communication_on_profile: Chomh maith le comhroinnt ag baint úsáide as uirlisí ionsuite an ghléis, is féidir %app_name% a shocrú le haghaidh téacs nó ríomhphost déthreo chuig teagmhálaithe saincheaptha agus maoirseoirí. Is féidir leat teagmhálaithe a chur ar phróifíl úsáideora faoi Mo Chuntas! [[ In addition to sharing using the device's built-in tools, %app_name% can be set up for two-way text or email to custom contacts and supervisors. You can add contacts on a user's profile under My Account!
consider_buying_for_contacts: Smaoinigh le do thoil ar %app_name% a cheannach chun rochtain a fháil ar an ngné seo agus tú ag obair le cumarsáidí íoctha. [[ Please consider purchasing %app_name% to gain access to this feature when working with paid communicators.
consider_communicator_buying_for_contact: Tá an ghné seo teoranta dóibh siúd a oibríonn le cuntais chumarsáide íoctha. [[ This feature is limited to those working with paid communicator accounts.
currently_premium_required: Tá an ghné seo teoranta do chumarsáideoirí a bhfuil cuntas préimhe gníomhach acu faoi láthair [[ This feature is limited to communicators with a currently-active premium account
copied_to_clipboard: Cóipeáladh an téacs chuig an ngearrthaisce! [[ Text copied to the clipboard!

add_as_read_only: Cuir Mar Amharc Amháin leis [[ Add As View Only
loading_activity_data: Sonraí gníomhaíochta á lódáil... [[ Loading activity data...

rooms_explainer: Is bealach iad seomraí chun maoirseoirí agus cumarsáide a eagrú ina ngrúpaí. Cuirtear maoirseoirí go huathoibríoch le cuntais na gcumarsóirí go léir ina seomraí, agus baintear iad go huathoibríoch mar mhaoirseoirí nuair a tharlaíonn athruithe seomra. [[ Rooms are a way to organize supervisors and communicators into groups. Supervisors are automatically added to the accounts of all communicators in their rooms, and are automatically removed as supervisors when room changes happen.
